name: Catastrophe Crow
description: Catastrophe Crow is a game that emulates Nintendo 64 graphics and gameplay. The game started off as an ARG, and has now become a full length game.

name: Super Crate Box Together
description: A Super Crate Box mod that introduces local and online multiplayer modes with support for up to 4 players.

name: Phantom of the Twilight
description: Enjoy a sweet romance with vampires in this otome novel adventure.

name: Honko's World
description: Honko is lost in the forest of some mysterious alien world. Help Honko find his home planet.

name: That Time I Became Friends With The Royal Scuttlebug Family And Fell From Space
description: Mario has made some new spectacular friends, who are these fellas? Well, they're the Royal Scuttlebug family. They are on a trip to the famous Hazy Maze Isles to see the new wonder: a Rocket! Ready for its first flight to new adventures! Our plumber and his new friends will make it there safely, right?

name: Fohh
description: Sin descripción

name: Gem of Destiny
description: [Gema do Destino] is a magical MMORPG with a wide world view and cool content featuring various dungeons and classic PVP experiences. As an MMORPG game, this game has incredible scene images with cool effects that give players a complete gaming experience.

name: The Crawler
description: In the middle of a forest, a group of kids stop by a supermarket to grab some snacks. As they wander through the aisles, strange things start to happen. They soon realize they are not alone. The main character must uncover the secrets of the supermarket and find a way out before it’s too late.

name: Gem Hunter
description:
“Gem Hunter” (Cazador de gemas) is an MMORPG game that combines combat, gathering, farming and social interaction in one, with a variety of game mechanics and a classic PVP experience. Here you will find charming characters within a super adorable and romantic anime-style virtual world.

Defeat terrible “Bosses” to raise your level and unlock extravagant abilities, also get the company of a faithful “Companion”, cute “Streales”, legendary “Gods” and among others. You can also create or join a guild for a more interactive and exciting adventure with other players.

name: The Cornfield Road
description: This is a short horror experience where you find yourself stuck in a mysterious road, tring to get back home. But are you really safe walking all by yourself?

name: Fate Seeker: Mission
description: Fate Seeker: Mission has launched its first Martial Art mobile game, offering millions of players an opportunity to create their own skill combinations and unify the world with authentic Martial Art. The game is a Roguelite Combat that offers stress-free mode with player's own choices at the tip of their fingers. Upgrade your champions idling and enjoy casual, fun, and exciting battles over a series of adventures

name: Tiny Adventure
description:
Welcome to Tiny Adventure!
A tiny tiny adventure in a big, big world.

name: Fantasy Three Kingdoms: War
description:
Dive into the legend of the Three Kingdoms. Magic, gods and devils, travel back in time for an epic adventure in the world of chaos and wonder!

This title was re-released under a different name:
- Fantasy Three Kingdoms: War [Indonesian]
- Legacy Fate: Sacred & Fearless

name: Laundry Night
description: You take a late night trip to the laundromat to do your laundry. It's incredibly peaceful when no one else is around, and you don't have to wait for a washer to be available. But, out of nowhere, spooky things start to happen. Will you survive the night?

name: Dark Continent: Mist
description: Dark Continent: Mist is a new MMORPG with gods and demons-based theme, offering a variety of well-designed team events. No longer do you have to face the world alone! Whether to become a demon or a god… The choice is in your hands…

name: Advent of God: Legends
description:
The new MMORPG, Advent of God: Legends will be officially launched soon!
An unprecedented crisis is approaching on the continent...
Resist the demon invasion with the gods and embark on this mysterious and legendary adventure!

name: Tap It Away
description: Tap the blocks to make them fly away and clear the screen. The blocks will only fly in one direction. As player progress, the blocks form bigger and bigger shapes, and the blocks themselves change form. There are more than 600 tapping levels with a variety of game mechanics.

name: Puzzle Words
description: Puzzle Words is a browser game of Boggle.

name: Puzzle Sudoku
description: Puzzle Sudoku is a web game version of Sudoku. The game features multiple boards varying in difficulty.

name: Babies vs. Monsters
description: Babies Vs Monsters is a bullet hell rogue-like game with RPG elements. Designed with cartoonish animations, this game offers various characters, level designs, and challenging boss battles that are both fun and difficult!

name: Rags to Liches
description: A small, third-person, action, tower defense game where you play as a peasant who gets tired of adventurers breaking into his house. Place down towers and fight off waves and waves of "enemies." Progress through the story and see just how far one man will go to protect his beloved llama.

name: Hive and Seek
description: Hive and Seek is a side-scrolling strategy base-building game where you clear randomly generated Roguelike stations infested with monsters. By rallying robots and clearing rooms, you will be able to destroy hives and recapture the station piece by piece.

name: Avventura nel Castello
description: Avventura nel Castello is a 1982 text adventure game by Enrico Colombini and Chiara Tovena, the first to be created and sold commercially by an Italian author, later included with the Apple II itself.

name: Memory Lane
description:
This game is a story-based textadventure where you can explore the town and discover mysterious places. Collect multiple items and interact with other citizens. There's just one hook... they no longer seem to remember you.

You can reach up to 6 different endings depending on your actions!

name: Two Days to the Race
description: Two Days to the Race is a text adventure game that you can play on your vintage computers. A text adventure is a game where all the interaction takes places with textand you instruct your alter ego by typing command at a prompt. The rest is done by your fantasy!

name: The Queen's Footsteps
description:
Today is August 27th, 1904. Nine months ago, you, Emilia Vittorini, joined the Italian Archeological Expedition in Egypt led by Ernesto Schiaparelli, the director of the Egyptian Museum of Turin. You are now back in Genoa, Italy: your steam ferry arrived three days ago with 25 wooden boxes containing Queen Nefertari Meritmut's grave goods, a real treasure! They left Genoa by train, heading towards Turin, yesterday evening. While they were in transit, you were invited to a sumptuous reception organised by a wealthy art lover, Eugenio Collovati, count of Raligotto, but it would be hard to say that you appreciated the evening.

But the reception was yesterday: now, you must catch the train to Turin and check that the treasure arrived safely. I will be your eyes and ears. Good luck.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Heroes
description:
A Sonic Heroes inspired level pack for Sonic Robo Blast 2 by STHE1230.

Team mechanics implemented like in the real Heroes game. There is a total of 34 emblems to find. Each level is a combination of act 1 and 2 from the original game. The Chaos Emeralds are hidden in the levels, think you can find them all?

name: SUGOI
description: SUGOI (Shut Up and Get On It) is a collaborative level pack created as a community project led by TehRealSalt. It was inspired by DUMP, a similar project from the ZDoom community. The premise of SUGOI was to encourage community members to make a level in a limited timeframe, similar to the Official Level Design Contest but without the competitive aspects. Any community member could contribute, regardless of their mapping experience, and all submissions made in good faith were accepted, regardless of their quality. The mapping phase lasted from July 9th until August 9th, 2016. Afterwards, TehRealSalt compiled the results into a level pack, which was released on September 6th, 2016. The project was much more successful than originally anticipated, receiving 30 maps from 25 different contributors. Its success inspired two sequels, SUBARASHII and KIMOKAWAIII.

name: Kimokawaiii
description: KIMOKAWAIII (also known as SUGOI 3, full title: KIMOKAWAIII Is My Origin, KIMOKAWAIII Always Waits And Is Intensely Interested) is the third and last entry in the SUGOI series, a series of collaborative level packs created by community members under the supervision of TehRealSalt. It contains 56 levels and features work by more than 60 different contributors, created over the months of April and May 2018 in two phases, with the first consisting of collaborative work on levels like the previous iterations (labeled KAWAIII) and a latter phase focused on the creation of custom boss fights (labeled KIMOIII), which later were merged into a single project. The level pack was initially released on August 17th, 2019, and is specially notable for bringing about the last patch of its current version of SRB2, v2.1.25, that catered to PolyObject bugs and a further expansion in the number of freeslots.

name: Ride Kamens
description: Ride Kamens is a free-to-play Japanese mobile game developed by Liber Entertainment for both Apple iOS and Android devices. The game is a spin-off of the overall Kamen Rider Series and set in its own unique world.

name: Yeeps: Hide & Seek
description:
Yeeps: Hide and Seek takes the best movement VR has to offer and builds on it, literally!

As a Yeep, your belly is full of stuffing used to craft anything from pillows for building to bombs for destruction. Pull items from your vast imagination and toss them into the world. The game’s intuitive block-based building makes it easy to express your creativity at any skill level.

name: ​Outer Wilds: A Thrilling Graphical Text Adventure
description: The original text adventure prototype for Outer Wilds, released to the public in celebration of the original game's fifth anniversary.

name: Amidar
description: Conversion of the Amidar tabletop for ZX Spectrum. Includes in each charge the two game modes of the original Tabletop: mode A and mode B.

name: AmiWordle
description: Sin descripción

name: Watch out!!!
description: Immerse yourself in the exciting feats of Oto, a small but very brave firefighter cat, who ventures into a burning building, avoiding dangerous debris to save other cats. Help him in his daring battle for survival and rescue the kittens in distress.

name: Arcade ZX Collection: Tetris
description: Amazing clone of TETRIS from arcade machines ported to the Spectrum. When you load this game on your Spectrum you will be transported to the arcades of the 80s. Get ready for a trip back in time.

name: Arcade ZX Collection: Botanic
description: Amazing clone of BOTANIC from arcade machines ported to the Spectrum. When you load this game on your Spectrum you will be transported to the arcades of the 80s. Get ready for a trip back in time.

name: Arcade ZX Collection: Anteater
description: Amazing clone of ANTEATER from arcade machines ported to the Spectrum. When you load this game on your Spectrum you will be transported to the arcades of the 80s. Get ready for a trip back in time.

name: Bloodrun
description: Completely redesigned Quake III Arena, it is already having 6 champions, following the same principle as in Quake Champions, it is planned to add more champions and add way more other champions. All mechanics and engine is Quake III Arena based, but the rest (maps, damage, weapons, champions) will be different.

name: Destroyer 7800
description: You are the anti-submarine warfare officer of a destroyer on patrol somewhere in the South Pacific. The sea below your ship is rife with enemy submarines. Your job is to destroy as many enemy submarines as possible within your 90-second firing window using your ship's main ASW weapon: The depth charge. Your ship can launch up to 4 depth charges at a time. Since depth charges are timed to explode at a pre-determined depth, you must place the aiming line at the depth you wish the charge to explode while gauging the time it will take the charge to reach that depth to explode on an enemy submarine. The aiming line can be moved vertically using the controller. Depth charges are not contact weapons so they will only destroy an enemy submarine upon exploding at the pre-determined depth. You may fire a depth charge by pressing the button on your controller. Your destroyer has two speeds which may be changed using the alternate button on the controller. If you manage to manage to rack up 2500 points or more, your firing window will be extended by 30 seconds.

name: Nitebear on Sleepystreet
description: Oh no! Aliens have ransacked the orphanage! Nite Bear must destroy aliens, kill the boss and save the souls of the poor orphan ghosts! Magical lolipops increase the power of Nite Bears throwing dagger. Rescuing orphan ghosts will heal. Stage 9 reveals the ultimate alien who must be stopped!

name: AntiAir
description:
To clear the level, you must destroy all the UFOs while avoiding falling bombs and blocks.

Blocks cannot be destroyed by your own bullets, but will disappear if hit by an enemy bomb.

name: Tarzan
description: A canceled port of Tarzan for ColecoVision.

name: Throwup Club
description: Throwup Club is an intricate choice-heavy psychological medicore thriller about an amnesiac facing both real and mental horrors within a world akin to an endless, liminal hospital. The game itself is an RCN (Roleplay & Click Novel) - a fusion genre of Visual Novel, RPG, and Point-&-Click games that centers around distressing content and how people choose to cope with trauma. Uncover the secrets of this strange world, and the ones lying within your own forgotten memories. Will you accept your limitations, or will you dive deep into delusion for a chance at hope?

name: Letter Bunny
description: Take on a cozy adventure as Anne, a small and determined bunny with a heart of gold. Explore the peaceful island, deliver many packages and discover that behind every letter is a unique story! Make new friends, help people out and most importantly, have fun!

name: Grapefruit
description: Grapefruit is a research-creation project exploring the concept of videogames rules by Salen and Zimmerman through the work of Yoko Ono, specifically the event scores or performative instructions published in Grapefruit.

name: Quiiiz
description:
Quiiiz is a real time online trivia game platform that allows players to win cash prizes.
The game connects creators, community managers, and their fans in a thrilling festival of engagement and monetization.

name: Dah-Varsity
description:
In this game, you’ll explore different STEAM topics like cars, math, music, books, space, and creating things. It’s a chance for you to learn while playing! When you play Dah-Varsity, you’ll learn about different jobs that match your interests in STEAM!

The game aims to help young adults develop a basic understanding of STEAM and entrepreneurship topics and foster the foundation for advanced STEAM learning and professional careers in the future.

Join the Dah-Varsity community and get ready for an awesome adventure filled with STEAM! Learn, have fun, and show the world what you can do.

name: Merlin: The Game
description: Merlin the Game is a real time cooperative fantasy-adventure game. Show your heroism, prove your camaraderie, live the adventure.

name: Amateur Surgeon Hospital
description: Sin descripción

name: Dick and Dom's Hoopla!
description: Sin descripción

name: MonsterMind
description: Monstermind - Build the city of your dreams. Crush the dreams of your friends. Dominate the world.

name: A Second Mario Bros. X Thing: Analog Funk
description: A Second Mario Bros. X Thing: Analog Funk is the sequel to A Super Mario Bros. X Thing: Prelude to the Stupid. Also developed by Talkhaus through the Super Mario Bros. X engine. Much like the first game, players can pick between 5 playable characters: Demo, Iris, Kood, Sheath and Raocow himself.

name: Make a Good Level Contest X3: The Movie - The Contest: The Game
description: A collaborative level design contest by the SMBX/SMBX2 community, released in 2021, and having taken over a third of SMBX's life cycle to be completed.

name: Jade Legends: Immortal Realm
description: Jade Legends: Immortal Realm is a new MMORPG with gods and demons-based theme, offering a variety of well-designed team events. No longer do you have to face the world alone! Whether to become a demon or a god… The choice is in your hands…

name: 2K1X Subzero Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: Make A Fun Awesome Boss 3: Friendship Always Best
description: A collaborative boss design contest held by Talkhaus in the Super Mario Bros. X 2 engine and released in 2023.

name: Doki: Chapter 0
description: A Super Mario Bros. X2 episode by Doki containing a original cast of characters.

name: Salomónico
description:
An interactive experiment inspired by the story of King Solomon.

This is a personal and clumsy relationship about imparting your judgment in crazy situations with sword blows.

You could say that it is in bad taste in many moments, it even gives you the option of cutting a baby in half.

name: A Day for Soft Food
description:
In A Day for Soft Food the player controls the hungry cat of a household. Its master (called "the Provider" in the game) is sound asleep in his bed, ill from some unknown sickness. His state of misery has left his faithful pet with barely anything to eat, and even the slightest mewl seems to annoy him. Can food be found without waking him up?

As with most modern interactive fiction, the player types in full sentences describing their intended actions (LOOK AT THE PROVIDER, MEW, and so on). The game requires a Z-interpreter to run.

name: Sets
description:
Three symbols appear in the centre of the screen as a vertical column and the player has to move them to one of 4 sets of 3 columns by pressing up, down, left or right. The idea is to build up lines of 3 matching symbols horizontally or diagonally to score points and gain a little time. The faster you make decisions the longer you will last, but the more mistakes you will make.

The author's personal best score is 9600, can you beat that?

Inspired by a video game popular in Belgian bars.

Features a high score table and redefinable keys. Joysticks and Zon-X sound supported.

name: Bob and the Alien Fire Flies
description:
The betenticled hedgehoctopus' origin story

Bob, a curious little hedgehog has just stumbled upon a small moonlit glade. Within it he's found some of the most delicious little glowing alien bugs that he has ever tasted. Help Bob eat his fill of these "out of this world" treats. But take care to avoid the sweeping teleport beams and be careful not to let those bugs stay red for too long......

Bob and the alien fire flies is my very first game ever, for any platform anywhere. The inspiration for the game's main character came from a pancake I made once (it really did look like a hedgehog with tentacles). The game written entirely in bAtari BASIC features 3 different game over animations and two hedgehogs. Yes, that's right, you can play alone as Bob or play in two player mode with a friend and control both Bob and Hog as they battle to be the first to eat 20 fire flies.

name: Bob and the Alien Fireflies
description: Bob, a curious little hedgehog has just stumbled upon a small moonlit glade. Within it he's found some of the most delicious little glowing alien bugs that he has ever tasted. Help Bob eat his fill of these "out of this world" treats. But take care to avoid the sweeping teleport beams and be careful not to let those bugs stay red for too long......

name: Evercade Alpha Street Fighter Bartop Arcade
description: The Evercade Alpha Street Fighter Bartop Arcade includes six titles from the legendary Street Fighter series by Capcom, including Street Fighter II‘ Champion Edition, Super Street Fighter II Turbo, Street Fighter Alpha: Warriors’ Dreams, Street Fighter Alpha 2, Street Fighter Alpha 3 and Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo.

name: Evercade Alpha Mega Man Bartop Arcade
description: The Evercade Alpha Mega Man Bartop Arcade features an eclectic mix of Capcom classics, including Mega Man: The Power Battle, Mega Man 2: The Power Fighters, Final Fight, Knights of the Round, Carrier Air Wing and Strider.

name: The Sea God
description: A tiny narrative game on gods, leviathans, death, blessings.

name: Innocence: A Seduce Me Story
description:
Before the demon war, there was a brilliant kingdom.
Within its walls lived a beautiful succubus princess.
She was a beacon of hope and peace to her people.
With such a heavy crown to bear, the princess found solace and affection in her childhood friend.
Does he truly love her in return?
--This is a prequel to the 2015 visual novel "Seduce Me the Otome"--

name: Mappy Micro Player
description: First released in 1983, MAPPY is the ultimate game of cat and mouse. Guide MAPPY, the police mouse, through the Meowkies mansion to recover all the stolen loot while avoiding cats and using trampolines to complete your mission. With its fun characters and outlandish story line, this arcade classic is sure to be a hit with gamers of all ages!

name: Lexibook Batman Compact Cyber Arcade Portable Console
description: Introducing the Lexibook Batman Compact Cyber Arcade Portable Console, your gateway to a world of endless entertainment! With 150 exhilarating games at your fingertips, including 10 action-packed Batman adventures and 140 classic favorites spanning sports, logic, adventure, platforms, and more, this pocket-sized powerhouse guarantees hours of non-stop fun for everyone. Hunt menacing monsters, escape perilous zones, score incredible goals, and race to victory in wild competitions, all on the vibrant 2.5" LCD color screen that brings every game to life with stunning visuals. Our portable console isn't just about gaming; it's a complete sensory experience. Immerse yourself in the Batman universe with its captivating design, celebrating the Dark Knight and enhancing every gaming session. The built-in speaker and volume control allow you to enjoy the immersive soundscapes without disturbance, making this console the ultimate gaming companion for on-the-go adventures. The Lexibook Batman Compact Cyber Arcade Portable Console isn't just a gaming device; it's a statement. Perfectly sized to accompany you wherever you roam, it fits effortlessly in your pocket or bag, ensuring that the excitement is always within reach. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a casual player, this console offers something for everyone, from adrenaline-pumping action to brain-teasing challenges. Experience the future of gaming with this battery-operated wonder, and elevate your leisure time to a whole new level. With Lexibook Compact Cyber Arcade Portable Console, you're not just buying a toy; you're investing in unforgettable memories and endless entertainment. Don't miss your chance to own this unique piece of gaming history—grab yours now and embark on an epic adventure that will leave you craving for more!

name: Pizz'Amore
description: You play as either Mario or Maria, the owner and lone chef of the famous New York Pizzeria “Pizz’Amore” who is suddenly and cruelly dumped! Unable to cope with the heartbreak, you decide that you will make the perfect pizza to heal your wounded heart!

name: Pac-Man Couchcade
description:
Have a seat, get comfy, and Play Again with an Arcade1Up Couchcade!

Easily connect the Micro Game Console to your TV via HDMI port, the wireless control deck features real-feel arcade controls on top, and a soft bean bag bottom. Yep, retrogaming just literally fell into your lap!

And yes, the Pac-Man Couchcade is absolutely packed with games. Let’s start off with our headliner, the icon of icons, PAC-MAN. Power up that nostalgia (no matter what your age), as you guide him through those infamous mazes, while steering clear of aggressive ghosts BLINKY, PINKY, INKY and CLYDE. Then take on the sequel, PAC-MANIA!

Oh, and that’s just the start of the phenomenal game list: you’ve also got the underground antics of DIG DUG and DIG DUG II, the interstellar action of GALAXIAN, GALAGA, and GALAGA ‘88, the lighthearted fun of MAPPY, and yeah, NEW RALLY-X and ROLLING THUNDER!

Yes, ALL are included. Switch up to any game at will, with the easy to navigate on-screen menus.

Ten games, unlimited retrogaming fun. If there’s any reason to become a couch potato (with no apologies), this is it. your Arcade1Up Couchcade is here!

name: Atari Couchcade
description:
Have a seat, get comfy, and Play Again with an Arcade1Up Couchcade!

Easily connect the Micro Game Console to your TV via HDMI port, the wireless control deck features real-feel arcade controls on top, and a soft bean bag bottom. Yep, retro gaming just literally fell into your lap!

When looking back at the history of video gaming, there is no doubt which company was the trailblazing pioneer: Atari. A name that became synonymous with the arcade boom, and a powerhouse in broad entertainment.

Atari titles captivated the world with vibrant graphics, easily learned yet challenging gameplay, and instantly recognizable imagery.

Now, relive an amazing Atari line up from the comfort of your own couch…no matter what your age! Packed inside this Couchcade, you’ve got ASTEROIDS and ASTEROIDS DELUXE. CENTIPEDE and MILLIPEDE. Yes, MISSILE COMMAND and TEMPEST are here. Oh, and yeah, you’ve also got MAJOR HAVOC, LUNAR LANDER, CRYSTAL CASTLES, and GRAVITAR!

Yes, ALL are included. Switch up to any game at will, with the easy to navigate on-screen menus.

Ten games, unlimited retro gaming fun. If there is any reason to become a couch potato (with no apologies), this is it. your Arcade1Up Couchcade is here!

name: Mini Lunar Ball
description: Sin descripción

name: The Bragger's Club
description: You don’t know how you got there. You don’t know why you were invited. However, you’re trapped in a room with only a speaker and mic to communicate with 4 other victims. What could possibly happen?

name: Maid With Perfection
description:
It's your lucky day! You won a special lottery! In the mail, you get the deed to a large estate in a place you've never heard of. You find yourself being driven there in a luxury car, feeling like a billion dollars.

As you arrive, you meet your maid, whom you get to name. She apparently the best Maid in the area and the fact that she chose you to be her master/mistress should honor you. The first day goes almost like a dream: your maid prepares amazing food, cleans the house, preps your bath, and even flirts with you a bit! Lucky you!

name: 2K Invaders
description:
Resist the waves of aliens. Protect from their lasers behind your bunkers which are gradually crumbling...

Created for the 2001 mini game competition by Richard Wilson.

name: Musou Glory
description: “Musou Glory” is a MMOARPG mobile game, a perfect blend of classic role-playing and the new open world gameplay, which create a massive storyline, expressed with visually stunning graphic! Brave the world with alliance, or even meet the love of your life in the world of “Musou Glory”!

name: Orebody: Sand Ripples
description:
Orebody: Sand Ripples is a short, box-pushing puzzle game for the NES. It takes place in the sci-fi fantasy world of Orebody, a planet known for its mining operations. In Sand Ripples, players control a sand squid in the Great Sand Sea Solorus, Orebody's largest desert. The Mining Cartel has threatened the delicate ecosystem of Solorus, and it's up to the sand squid to fill in their mining tunnels and foil their operations.

Play through 22 unique levels in a short and sweet box-pushing puzzle game.

name: Sword Warriors
description: “Sword Warriors” is a MMOARPG mobile game, a perfect blend of classic role-playing and the new open world gameplay, which create a massive storyline, expressed with visually stunning graphic! Brave the world with alliance, or even meet the love of your life in the world of “Sword Warriors”!

name: Advanced Fantasian: Quest for Lost Sanctuary
description: Long ago, humans and other creatures lived peacefully in a magical paradise. However, one day a new star appeared nearby. A meteorite fell onto the Earth, turning it into a realm of perpetual darkness and misery. Humans managed to restore the land to its original state. But orcs, trolls, and other hostile races refused to give up their territory. Thus, the second age of peace quickly turned into an age of a new battle...

name: Alef's Blademaker: Arms Shop
description:
Blade Maker - Arms Shops begins when the main character's father died and leaves him with a debt that he got to pay in 6 months. The game starts in January and ends at the end of June, if the player can't pay the debt it is game over.
Each month is divided into 4 weeks, in those weeks the player can go around the town and buy materials and other items, he also can make new weapons and tools. Some customers will go to the shop and depending on the skills, the quality and the player's reputation there will be more customers.
There are also adventure events that the player has to solve, if he fails he got to do the same event in the last week or each month.
There are a lot of conversations with other characters, customers and girls. There are different endings depending on the actions and reputation that the player got at the end of June, and the same if he pays or not the debt.

name: Arabian Kid
description: Arabian Kid is a Japanese Action-puzzle platformer game, developed by Yellow Horn Co and published by ASCII Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Vibrant Frame
description: An otome novel adventure that captures a slice of life and sweet romance of youths striving for their dreams without despairing over reality.

name: Bomi Omyeon Kkochi Pigo
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Saga: Evolution
description: Start an Adventure with Cute Pets! MMORPG 2023, another world adventure "Monster Saga: Evolution"! Invite your Pet and friends to go on an adventure in another world! Explore the mysterious story of the Continent of Light together and write your own legend along the way!

name: Cruelty
description: "CRUELTY" is a Japanese-made splatter horror. You were in an accident and lost consciousness. The moment you wake up, you find yourself in a nightmare world, one that is not of this Earth. In an abattoir ruled by madness, horrific scenes unfold, and inescapable terror awaits you.

name: FootyKitDle
description: A daily quiz where the player has to guess the football team by their home hit... one piece at a time

name: Relic Rush
description:
Silver Award Winner from Pocket Gamer! Relic Rush is an addictive adventure game. Use one touch controls to help our fearless hero navigate dangers as he collects the idols. Explore exotic locations like jungles and deserts as you race against the clock. Can you collect them all? - Beautiful Pixel Art
- Easy One Touch Controls
- Over 100 Levels to explore and navigate
- Original Chiptune Soundtrack
- 5 Unique Worlds to Adventure through
- Retro Sounds

name: The Fall: Mutant City
description: Caught in post-apocalyptic desert and ravaged by a treacherous disease, nameless outcast has reached a biosphere, a huge dome that covers the city and protects it from the desert. This city is now controlled by mutant clan, which worships to the prophet. Several survivors exist in their hideouts, and one of them, Henry Leicester, saves the outcast once he enters the city. His motives are simple; the outcast should help him with certain tasks and he helps the outcast with medicine to cure the disease. During the game, player will meet more survivors, understand who is who, and try to survive.

name: Persist Online
description: Persist Online is an MMORPG with zombies, so you better get yourself a gun. Survive in an unforgiving open world, where every building is accessible. Forge a deadly team with friends and claim what's not yours. Take your loot to your safe bunker to craft better gear. Some survive. The best persist!

name: The Witches' Whisk
description:
Manage a magical bakery with your witches' whisk — which doubles as a wand!

Bake pastries, cakes, cookies, and more by casting spells and enchantments to complete orders for your hungry customers. In the Witches' Whisk, you'll play as a witch who owns a bakery. You'll be tasked with bakery management, challenging spell casting, recipe unlocking, decorating desserts and more.

In addition, you will be able to build and upgrade your bakery, including decorating the layout and earning new spells along the way to help you take your recipes even further! You'll be able to decorate your baked goods in fun ways that are unique to your style that you can re-use later. Speaking of style... you will be able to create and customize your own character in this magical journey.

name: Miss Chocolate Eater
description: A very short visual novel about a lonely, bitter woman running a dusty shop meeting the most beautiful women she's ever met, who are also taking her beloved chocolates.

name: SpongeBob Run
description: A web browser game that has SpongeBob running through levels non-stop.

name: Bubble Blast
description: The player must help Patrick with navigating the Chum Caverns by having him avoid bumping into stuff as he progresses.

name: Fridge Escape
description: Don't let anyone eat you. Run to save your life!

name: Football Striker 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: Sky Dunk
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man: Square Root of Negative One
description: Mega Man Square Root of Negative One is a fan game created by Theimaginarymegaman (also known as snow runt pyro.)

name: Cazzarion: Car Chase
description: Sin descripción

name: Ring Man in the Castle
description:
"Play as Ring Man and venture through an old Wily castle at Dr Cossack's request.

Complete four levels and battle 5 bosses in this short fangame.

Made with Megamix Engine."

name: Tackle Fire With Gun: The Game
description:
"There is no plot. Just kill!
Dash and shoot as Tackle Fire through 7 action packed levels.
Amass various weapons and get power-ups through a card combo system.

Features: powerful bosses, a gun, invinsible dashing , flame gun,
over 9 card combos, big gun, awesome mid-air flip animation, laser gun,
a truck."

name: Father's Day Journey
description: Father's Day Journey is a delightful puzzle game designed to celebrate the enchanting atmosphere of Father's Day. Flip Father's Day themed cards to uncover matching pairs.

name: Warfront Tactics: Battlefield Chronicles Battle Simulator
description: Unleash the commander within in Warfront Tactics - Battlefield Chronicles Battle Simulator, a captivating physics-based strategy game that thrusts you into the heart of epic warfare. Strategically allocate your resources, craft a formidable army, and outmaneuver your opponents in intense battles governed by realistic physics. Witness the chaos and spectacle of combat as your meticulously planned strategies unfold on the battlefield. Every decision carries weight, every encounter presents a challenge, and every victory is hard-won.

name: Samurai Katana Rampage: Stickman Saga
description: Unleash Your Inner Samurai: Seek Justice with the Power of the Katana!

name: Global Resistance
description: Global Resistance was a social media game for the Resistance series.

name: Skylanders: Universe
description: Skylanders: Universe, originally called Skylanders: Spyro's Universe, was an online RPG set in Beta, it was available at the official Universe website.

name: Critical Strike Shooter: SWAT Rescue Missions
description: Become an elite operative, rescue hostages, win glory. Intense rescue missions await!

name: FIFA Superstars
description: FIFA Superstars was a football managing game developed by Playfish and Electronic Arts.

name: ZooMumba
description: ZooMumba was a free-to-play zoo simulator developed and published by Bigpoint where players took up the responsibility of creating and maintaining a zoo. Players started with an empty piece of land to transform into a successful zoo. Players had a variety of objects and tools at their disposal to transform the empty piece of land into one of the world’s best zoos. As of July 2018, there were over 17,150,000 registered users of the game, and it was available in 26 different languages.

name: D Missile
description: Sin descripción

name: Yaoling: Mythical Journey
description: Yaoling: Mythical Journey is a creature collecting Eastern fantasy RPG featuring an world filled with rich stories and unique Yaolings. Tasked to uncover a mysterious evil, you embark on a journey with your Yaolings, forming new friendships, engage in intense battles, and face countless challenges!

name: Arcade Archives: Fighter & Attacker
description: Sin descripción

name: Namco Super Heroes
description: Namco Super Heroes is a fan-made fighting game for Windows developed by hiro, released in 2007, with the latest version in 2016. Five classic Namco characters are playable; Bravoman (written as "Berabow Man"), Wonder Momo, Gil from The Tower of Druaga, Rick from Splatterhouse, and Valkyrie from Valkyrie no Bouken.

name: Doukyuusei Remake CSver
description: Sin descripción

name: Dig
description: Dig through the earth in a remote controlled drill. Collect enough money to earn your freedom.

name: Eggsplosion
description: Sin descripción

name: Diabotical Rogue
description: Diabotical Rogue is an online, PvP, first-person shooter with roguelike systems. Made for FPS enthusiasts, players can experience fast-paced gameplay in buttery smooth movement, combined with the power of roguelike upgrade choices.

name: Super Cursor
description: Start your journey in Cursor Ville, where you'll be tested in your precision, agility, patience, and determination! Will you be able make your ways through the treacherous world and save your beloved princess? Aim, dodge, move, and most importantly, never give up!

name: Vay
description: The 16-bit cult classic RPG from 1994 returns with tons of improvements! When your peaceful kingdom is attacked on your wedding day and your wife-to-be is kidnapped, it falls to you to journey across the world and stop the terrible machines of war that threaten to lay waste to it.

name: Star Flashback Blast!
description: Have a Blast! with 12 of the greatest home action games. Play Front Line, Jungle Hunt, Space Invaders, Star Wars, Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back, The Astyanax, and more of your favorites with your very own micro-console!

name: The Backstreets
description: The Backstreets is a doom-like FPS made by GRG Productions. You play as Kain Rodriguez, who must fight The Moths to stop them from cloning people. However, you might be a clone yourself. The Moths are a vicious terrorist organization who have taken over many towns and cities, but there are rumors that something much more is going on behind the scenes. Find out what they are doing by playing The Backstreets.

name: Adventure Flashback Blast!
description: Sin descripción

name: Maximum Apocalypse: The Video Game
description: Scavenge, battle, survive! Choose your survivor and face diverse apocalyptic scenarios in this cooperative digital adaptation of the hit board game Maximum Apocalypse. Grab your friends or make new ones with 1-6 player apocalyptic roguelike gameplay.

name: Living in a Brothel
description: Live the experience of being a Brothel Manager and train the girls to "serve" the customers in the best way possible.

name: Pulzar
description: Evade solar storms to escape galactic police.

name: Chase H.Q. II
description:
Similar to Chase H.Q. in this sequel you drive on a freeway trying to catch up with five criminals who have committed felonies, with time against you.

You can choose one of three vehicles to drive: a sports car, 4-wheel drive, and a semi truck. Each one of them having their advantages and disadvantages.

name: Pokémon Donjon Mystère Online
description:
PDMO is a French free 2D MMORPG based on the Pokemon Mystery Dungeon series. Embark on a unique adventure as one of 20 different pokemon starters! Missions, harvesting, crafting, tumultuous dungeons, events, pokemons and, above all, fun!

Start your adventure now!

name: Sector Zero
description: SECTOR ZERO is a reverse horror physics-based puzzle platformer where you play as a monster! You are part of The Corruption - an Alien Hive Mind Entity hunting down survivors inside the Mining Colony of Asteroid 2031 XT.

name: Apex Legends: PlayStation Plus Play Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Munch
description: Kill. Eat. Evolve. Unleash your inner monster and incite Chaos in this reverse-horror fantasy action roguelite. Devour the Followers of Order to absorb their elements and mutate a new twisted body forged from Flesh, Nekro, and Ore. Crush their god Ördo to bring back the Gods of Heavy Metal!

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 10
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Top
description: This is a prototype of a children's educational game that was done by James WickStead Design Associates. It was archived from JWDA graphics designer Robin Ballweg. According to to her, the game was never fully developed.

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 11
description: Sin descripción

name: A New Life
description: Sin descripción

name: A Stop for the Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Pipsqueak!
description:
Explore a strange and hostile world in this search-action platformer starring a tiny mouse named Tofu.

Pipsqueak! is a search-action platformer starring Tofu, a small mouse exploring a strange and hostile world. Uncover the truth of this expansive world and your place within it through exploration, discovery, combat, and platforming challenges. Bring hope to this dying world and its tiny inhabitants in this grand adventure of mouse-sized proportions!

name: Cozy Dungeons
description: Explore deadly dungeons, clear them out of enemies and renovate them in Cozy Dungeons, a one-of-a-kind adventure/interior design game!

name: BrokenLore: Low
description: Low, a first-person Horror Game, immerses players in the dark prelude of BrokenLore's story. Set in a mist-shrouded Japanese village, players uncover deep-seated hatred and ancient secrets. Navigate a hyperrealistic, claustrophobic environment where supernatural forces and tragic cycles abound.

name: LowLife Forms
description: An epic RPG shooter filled with alien and droid gangsters, space shamans and cosmic smuggling.

name: A Whole New Ball Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Deckfort Alchemist
description: Strategic roguelike tower defense game where you fortify your defense line by stacking cards in deckforts, play various cards on enemies and deployable grids, and receive general contributions to your defense from altar structures.

name: Whole New Ball Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Mortal Kombat X: Samurai Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Cluster
description:
Cluster is a metaverse platform that lets you play, from anywhere, from many devices. Phones, PC, VR are supported and expanding.

Events like concert and meetups, and many worlds await you. You can game, or chill out with friends, ... possibilities are endless.

name: Flat Machine
description:
In the not-so-distant future, a fate-bound settlement installs a gatekeeper robot with no limbs or memories.

To guard the settlement in this post-apocalyptic world, the gatekeeper robot must respond to various visitors, from mutants and thieves to even rogue microwaves.

name: QBeez 2
description: The adorable stars of one of the most addictive puzzle games around are back! And this time, they've brought a few friends! Join the colorful QBeez on Q's Quest where you'll be introduced to twelve all-new puzzle elements, including explosive bombs, buzzing bees, chomping sharks and more. Challenge your matching skills in Classic Mode or bend your brain in Puzzle mode. Even create your own QBeez puzzles in the easy-to-use Puzzle Maker. QBeez together - again!

name: Skel and Defense
description: Sin descripción

name: Alley Restaurant Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Seascape Paradiso
description:
Underwater photographer Jay has always had a passion for the ocean. She'd never tell you that she thinks she's seen it all...but she'd have to admit that she never thought she'd meet a real-life mermaid on a dive!

But bubbly and mysterious Echo disappears nearly as soon as Jay meets her. Can the two of them reunite, or will it be a one-time encounter?

name: Hitman 3 VR: Reloaded
description:
In HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded Agent 47 returns as the world’s top assassin for the most important contracts of his entire career.
Rebuilt from the ground up for VR, HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded marks a significant milestone in the HITMAN series, leveraging the power of Meta Quest 3 to deliver an unparalleled, untethered, and unrivalled VR experience.

name: Call of Duty: Zombie Warfare
description: Sin descripción

name: City Bus Simulator 2024
description: Embark on the ultimate urban adventure in City Bus Simulator 2024, where the bustling streets are your playground and the city's pulse beats through every road. Get ready to take the wheel of detailed buses, transporting passengers through a dynamic metropolis teeming with endless possibilities!

name: The Moto Racer Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Late Night Shift
description:
At 1 am you wake up to the sound of your cell phone, it turns out it's your coworker, you work at a 24 hour super market, and you work the night shift.

in this game you have to complete the tasks you are supposed to do, there are also several jump scares here, so prepare your heart!

name: Say a Prayer
description: Sin descripción

name: Cazzarion: Tank Killer
description: Sin descripción

name: Offroad Jeep Driving
description: Sin descripción

name: Xonix
description: Remake of a classic old-school hit, one of the first arcade games ever!

name: Undernauts: Labyrinth of Yomi & Mon-Yu
description: Undernauts: Labyrinth of Yomi & Mon-Yu Bundle

name: Tiny Little Farm
description:
Take care of your own plantation with different types of crops.

“Amazing, the best!“

name: Frame Breaker
description: Frame Breaker is a top-down roguelite precision platformer.

name: Break Free
description: Come shoot some balls and break stuff in this incredible next-gen graphics with realistic physics fun game.

name: T2048
description: Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile, however this time it's in a triangle.

name: Danganronpa Mauve
description: A Korean Danganronpa Fangame, 15 students are trapped in Hope's Peak Academy, with a new cast introduced for this story.

name: Kamen Rider Battle Rush
description: Kamen Rider Battle Rush is a tower defense RPG mobile game based off the Kamen Rider universe! To commemorate the franchise's 45th anniversary, Kamen Rider Battle Rush will bring you a refreshing experience where you'll control and build your favorite Riders to defend against the marching forces of evil!

name: Circling
description:
Poem adapted from "The sun changed colors" by Margorie Agosín.

Created for bitsy jam #81 - tomatoes.

name: Rock Bottom
description: Rock Bottom starts off in prison. You have done three days of your fourteen day sentence and can’t take it anymore. You decide to break out of jail. How? Simply get a custume from Professor X, sneak into the prison guard’s masked ball and spike their punch with some weird chemical. Give a toast to a retired prison guard, everyone drinks the punch and they all pass out or die. Then you walk out of prison and start your life anew on some mean streets.

name: Danganronpa Croxx: The Beginning of the Despair Plan
description: Danganronpa Croxx is a Korean fan game based on the Danganronpa Series.

name: Danganronpa Hope Recreation
description: Embark on a thrilling journey filled with deception, despair, and unexpected twists, all in a parallel universe with no connection to the original creators of danganronpa.

name: Hyper Danganronpa Melancholy
description:
16 Students Trapped in a Killing Game?
But a story of dual academies, forming into one.
A story filled with students from dual academies being faced up into the same brim of ....Melancholy. Each student not only has a unique talent.. but a unique special secret each of them have...

name: Danganronpa Blowback: The Stage of Repeated Despair and Hope
description: A cancelled Korean fan game created by a group of Korean Danganronpa fans called Team MonoLab. The game had a prologue and two fully released chapters prior to its cancellation.

name: Maximum Football
description:
Lead your team to victory in the ultimate football simulation! Start your college career or play with the pros across varied and dynamic stadiums around the country. As head coach, make all the decisions, from drafting your roster to calling the plays. The Maximum Football universe has been completely overhauled to deliver players an ultrarealistic experience that is entirely free to play.

Fully customize your team, recruit your dream roster, and take it to the gridiron locally or online as you build your legacy. Tight, rewarding moves allow players to feel the true sensation of being on the field and smooth, responsive controls mean every play is performed as planned. Live service content ensures fresh chances to up your game as you rise through the ranks to take your place beside the legends.

name: Danganronpa Weeping Rebellion
description: A french fangame based on the Danganronpa series, playing with a new cast of characters as Herschel Klosmo, the Ultimate Police Officer, forced into a brand new killing game.

name: Legacy: Steel & Sorcery
description: Explore the dangerous beauty of Legacy: Steel & Sorcery as you race to find lost treasures while battling players and monsters in merciless action combat. But make sure to find your way back to safety before it's too late—or risk losing it all.

name: Danganronpa: Eternal Endings
description: After each dying in horrific accidents, 17 people from all across the world and time find themselves trapped in a strange purgatory like realm with only one way to free their trapped souls: spiritual murder.

name: Danganronpa: Abandoned Lights
description:
14 former students get called back to their school that they used to go.

But as they go there, things escalate pretty quickly.

name: Re: Danganronpa Refresh Retreat
description: After a rather odd kidnapping, 16 people wake up in a mansion, all the doors are locked and it seems like there is no way out. Follow Amy Miller and the fifteen other inhabitants of the refresh retreat as they uncover the mystery surrounding the killing game and who exactly is keeping them imprisoned.

name: Danganronpa Absolute Vindication
description: Mearu, The Ultimate Journalist who goes by a pseudonym, suddenly awakes in an empty classroom amongst 14 other Ultimate Students, unsure how she got there. After some investigation, they're all met with an android known as Monorakun, who explains to them that they'll live in that school until the rest of their lives, unless they choose to murder a fellow classmate and get away with it.

name: Danganronpa Dreamland: Hymn of the Sea and Whales
description: The premise is as usual 15 students trapped in a school, Hope Peak Academy....or is it?

name: Danganronpa Daydream
description: A fan game of the Danganronpa series made in Korea.

name: One Room: Prisoner's Dilemma
description: 6 People - 1 Room - 1 way to escape. Welcome to One Room - Prisoner's Dilemma.

name: Gragyriss, Captor of Princesses
description:
Gragyriss, Captor of Princesses is a mouse-only strategy Flash game about dragon life - devour lambs, grow stronger, raid settlements, fight weak humans, elves and undead, kidnap beautiful princesses.
Developed by SnowRoadGames and published on Armor Games on January 3, 2019.

name: Sonic & Ashuro
description: Sonic the Hedgehog & Ashuro is an awesome ROM hack based on the classic Sonic the Hedgehog. Created by username Ashuro from SSRG (Drakughost), the game features 2 characters and 2 universes on one single screen. The game features custom and special stages with 3 acts that take place during the different time of the day. In this game, you will control both Sonic and Ashuro. The two characters have similar movement but use a different approach on various obstacles like water and high places. If you can collect 50 coins during the gameplay, you will transform into a more powerful form. Good luck!

name: Who Is The Killer: Episode IV
description: You have recently received an unexpected invitation. Frederick Adams, a psychiatrist whom you met several years ago, has invited you to observe a remarkable case of mental illness. Late at night, you arrived at the hospital near which your old friend lived. But in the morning, that particular female patient was found dead...

name: Zelda: The Ultimate Trial
description: Deep inside the Lost Woods lies a mysterious Stronghold, inhabited by lost travellers. As Link enters this place, he is greeted by Shiba, the protector of the fortress. He places the task of conquering the 3 Trials upon Link. He needs to meet new people and explore each corner of the Stronghold to be prepared, but will he be able to conquer them all and eventually reach the Ultimate Trial ?

name: Guild Wars 2: Janthir Wilds
description: Explore new lands, wield a spear in combat, and test yourself in challenging encounters in Guild Wars 2: Janthir Wilds. The newest adventure in the world of Tyria will play out over the course of four quarterly releases: a year of content, feature updates, and more.

name: Light Of Chaos
description: Sin descripción

name: Capes: Supporter Pack
description: The Supporter Pack contains all DLC for Capes

name: Run & Jump Guy
description: Leap into "Run & Jump Guy," a pixel-packed platformer spanning three thrilling worlds: Island, Snowy Forest, and Castle. Overcome enemies and obstacles to conquer the ultimate boss!

name: Mortal Kombat X: Blue Steel Sub-Zero
description: Sin descripción

name: Outbreak: Blood & Teeth Collection
description: Classic survival horror burns strong in three unique adventures as dinosaurs and zombies tear a sleepy midwestern town apart.

name: Mortal Kombat X: Brazil Pack
description: Three new character skins. Play as Futbol Cage, Capoeira Liu Kang, and Gaucho Kung Lao in this themed skin pack.

name: Triad
description: Embark on an epic journey across the realm of Lyria in this real time fantasy RPG paying homage to classic games. Assemble your Triad from 15 unique classes, engage in strategic tab-targeting combat, and uncover ancient secrets in a world of danger and mystery.

name: The Battle of Aurinoxia
description: A retro space shoot 'em up with pixel art graphics, unique enemies, tough angry bosses, and a killer soundtrack. You are among the first pilots to arrive in the system to mount the counteroffensive against the aggressors. Get out there and show these aliens the price for messing with The Alliance!

name: Intergalacto-1
description: Intergalacto-1 features intense multiplayer battles in Warzone mode and thrilling survival experiences in mystical horror mode, filled with magical elements and numerous exciting modes. Conquer the galaxy's hidden worlds and face the formidable boss, INM.

name: Just Keep Digging
description: Welcome to Bodie, a company mining town. Meet rising weekly profit quotas by digging deeper for rare ores and gems. Encounter ruined structures, ancient fossils, and dangerous cave dwellers. Sell your findings for company coins to upgrade your gear and keep digging!

name: Tomb Stalkers
description: An Arcade Action Puzzle game like few with fast paced mechanics. Walk around the tombs to open them and reveal their content, you require to get a key and a relic to be able to unlock the exit to the next level. But beware, the sorceress minions are upon you with their unique abilities.

name: DCS World: OH-58D Kiowa Warrior
description: Experience the ultimate in rotary-wing aviation with the OH-58D Kiowa Warrior in DCS World. This meticulously crafted simulation brings the legendary reconnaissance and light attack helicopter to life with unparalleled accuracy and detail.

name: Memo Blox
description: Memo Blox is a casual game that challenges your attention and memory. The game features a good minimalistic style and great music. Can you become a Master of Memo Blox?

name: Broken Shell
description: Broken Shell is a cute and cozy adventure game filled with love and courage. Join Mr. and Mrs. Hermit, an adorable couple, as they navigate through a charming world filled with puzzles, challenges, and heartwarming moments on their heartfelt journey to a better life.

name: Flag Clicker
description: Flag is a clicker Game, in which you click a Flag!

name: Let It Die
description: Let It Die is a small point-and-click adventure game that puts you in the shoes of Laura, an intergalactic delivery person who has been sent on a rather peculiar mission by her company.

name: Ark: Fantastic Tames - Pyromane
description: Introducing the first of a new series of Fantastic Tames for ARK: Survival Ascended: the Pyromane! Owners of one of this new class of creatures gain access to a wondrous array of useful abilities!

name: Ark: The Center Ascended
description: The Center is a free add-on for ARK: Survival Ascended that includes a massive new map for survivors to explore. The Center is nearly double the size of The Island, making it about 70 sq. kilometers and featuring a rich, hand-drawn Tolkien-esque aesthetic.

name: Kitesurf Runner
description: Become a kitesurfing hero in this 2D X-treme sports runner game.

name: Goo Go
description: Test your skills, patience, and nerves in a game where one mistake will send you back to the beginning. Oh, and welcome to "Goo Go"!

name: The South Island
description: Welcome to The South Island! Step into the shoes of a young adventurer, explore the rich fauna and flora while collecting essential resources, learn about the indigenous culture, and face unique enemies and bosses of the region to rescue your family in this old-school RPG!

name: Oracle of Meles
description: An ancient prophecy, a chosen one? Hack and slash your way through an evil castle, collect powerful artifacts, and uncover its dark secrets. Explore this 2D hand-drawn world full of magic and monsters where nothing is as it seems.

name: Containment Initiative 2
description: Containment Initiative 2 is a local asymmetric co-op VR shooter which can be played by two people on the same PC. Kill zombies alone in VR or have a friend cover you by using the mouse and keyboard. Explore and scavenge to unlock new gear and weapons to help you survive the infected horde!

name: Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy - Battle Pack 2
description: The pack tracks the 4th Infantry Division on D-Day and the 101st Airborne Division till June 13, 1944. This date marks a milestone in the Normandy campaign as Carentan is secured, and a linkup between American beaches is established, symbolizing the campaign's initial success.

name: Alex the Ball
description: Alex has turned into a ball after an experiment went wrong. As he navigates Nova Station, things become even more complicated when he finds himself in a parallel universe. A physics-based 3D platformer that can be completed in one go, if you don't fall, die, or quit.

name: Twinworld Survivor
description: Twinworld Survivor is a survival roguelite where you play a girl just become an investigator and entered the twinworld by accident. Choose from a variety of traits and items to create unique builds, and defeat waves of monsters to survive, and uncover the secrets of the twinworld.

name: Below Level
description: Navigate through an underground parking lot in search of four important cars. Armed with only a phone, evade the abnormals that are sent to intercept you and make it out alive.

name: Boxmania
description: Boxmania is a 2D puzzle game designed to be challenging, fun, and to make the player think on every level. Each of the 50 levels is created to show unique aspects of the simple concept of moving boxes, all while being possible. After completion, enjoy the other equally fun game modes.

name: Puss in Woods
description: What will Jack do? Can he take care of his wife and also look after his farm and survive the winter?

name: Ultimate General: American Revolution - Premium Edition
description: The Premium Edition is a tribute to our most dedicated fans and supporters. By purchasing the Premium Edition, you are not only getting access to all the exclusive content of the Premium Edition but also showing your support for the continued development and expansion of the Ultimate General series.

name: Construction Simulator: Stadium Expansion
description: Ready, set, goal? Wait a second! For thrilling soccer matches you'll need an equally impressive venue - and the Stadium Expansion for Construction Simulator is your chance to build a stadium including related facilities.

name: Pinball M: Texas Chainsaw Massacre Pinball
description: Put on the mask and rev the chainsaw - Leatherface returns to slaughter in pinball form! Aim your shots and use all your skills to take out your victims in one of the most brutal pinball tables ever created.

name: Chornobyl Liquidators - Supporter Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Bankshot Launchers
description: Create havoc in this ricocheting arena shooter where precise trick-shots are king. Master a variety of unique weapons and work with your team in challenging levels to achieve victory over your opponents.

name: STEM Defense
description: Battle microscopic threats in 'STEM Defense', a hex-grid tower defense adventure using the power of the Immune System. Face waves of pathogens, unlock powerful Cells and Upgrades, Evolve your defenses and prepare for a microscopic battle of survival!

name: Blocky Ascent
description: A high-stakes first-person parkour platformer. Overcome dynamic obstacles like moving platforms and anti-gravity fields. Discover shortcuts to reach the summit faster, but beware, the climb demands mastery.

name: Golf Bash: Online
description: Golf Bash: Online is the ultimate golf showdown where friendship takes a swing! In this silly party game, grab your clubs and prepare to battle it out throughout a round of golf.

name: Silent Mourning
description: Your sister has been missing for a few days. You head out to the cabin she was staying at, but it seems you're not the only one there

name: The Playful Worm
description: Embark on a Challenging Journey to Freedom!

name: Tekken
description: The console version of Tekken adds more content to the original arcade game such as new characters and additional game modes.

name: Pirate's Money
description: Welcome to Pirate's Money, the ultimate adventure on the seven seas, where strategy, courage and cunning determine who will reign over the treacherous waters of Pirate's Island! Your legend begins now. Raise the sails, load the cannons and win BIG in Pirate's Money.

name: Samurai of the Samurais
description: Begin your fight for honor and freedom now!

name: The Falling Car
description: Are you tired of mundane car drifting games?

name: The Crystal of the Cave
description: Embark on an Epic Quest in The Crystal of the Cave!

name: Crackin' Smackin: Customization Set - Sandman
description: Send your adversaries to the land of dreams with the Sandman-Set! Lovingly put everyone to sleep with a Pillow whilst looking adorable in your Pajamas. - Customization DLC

name: Crackin' Smackin: Customization Set - Pumpkinhead
description: Show your spooky side and send your opponents for a run! - Customization DLC

name: Crackin' Smackin: Customization Set - Warrior
description: Leather, spikes and horns what else could a real warrior need? Show your martial prowess with style! - Customization DLC

name: Crackin' Smackin: Customization Set - Skully
description: Trophies are not only collected to be hung on a wall! Show them what you got! - Customization DLC

name: Crackin' Smackin: Customization Set - Woodpecker
description: A feathery appearance for your Caveman! Knock your opponent out with precise smacks! - Customization DLC

name: I Commissioned Some Bunnies 8
description: I paid artists to hide bunnies and carrots in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Final Spin
description: A 2-4 player online party game about risking your life for the thrill of high-stakes gambling. Use your items wisely to gain an edge over chance and play until you are the last person standing.

name: Destiny 2: Echoes Silver Bundle
description: Purchase the Echoes Silver Bundle and receive the Power Stance Dance Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase Episode: Echoes, cosmetics, and more!

name: Agents of Argus
description: "Agents of ARGUS" is an isometric midcore stealth game.

name: Random Hero Defense
description: Block enemies with randomly generated heroes Survive until the last round and clear the game. Defeat enemies and use the gold you earn to produce more heroes and become stronger.

name: Red Rampant
description: Red Rampant is a narrative-driven action-adventure game set in Medieval Scotland. With the ability to travel back in time through their memories of previous gameplay and begin again, players use knowledge gained from past mistakes and hindsight of future events to change the course of history.

name: Total Conflict: Resistance - Eastern Airborne Forces
description: Additional research branch "Eastern Airborne Forces".

name: Fishing Planet: Ocean Voyager Pack
description: Go on a 30-day ocean fishing voyage in the waters of Kaiji No Ri island aboard the swift Scutum fishing yacht with the Ocean Voyager Pack! The yacht comes with 6 rod holders (2 for each player) and enough space to store the catch of each of three anglers onboard.

name: The Unseen Fears: Fortune's Consequence - Collector's Edition
description: Can you escape an ancient ice spirit before it's too late?

name: Ranger Force
description: Ranger Force is an atmospheric third person, action, adventure, shooter, and fighting game that can be experienced alone, or with a partner in multiplayer split-screen mode.

name: Void Mother: Survivor
description: Conquer Void Mothers horde of fever dream creatures in this action packed horde shooter. Theorycraft with player passives and navigate a fast paced world with randomly generated items whilst battling your way to become an unstoppable force.

name: Breadborn
description: Breadborn is a crazy action game where you command an army of crumb minions that came from very own body. Branches, axes, or a killer mini-gun? It's up to you to decide how to equip your army in order to sow chaos among the peasants and get to the PRINCE himself!

name: Neon Puzzle Ball
description: Neon Puzzle Ball is a fun and challenging 2D action puzzle platformer. Navigate each level unlocking doors and mastering new modifiers and hazards, while striving for quicker completion times.

name: Brainwave Trials
description: Brainwave Trials presents itself as a first-person puzzle-platformer experience where the player takes the role of a volunteer within the Garnet Research And Development Sector. By utilizing parkour mechanics and dimensional manipulation, the player will be able to overcome the trials of science.

name: The Mythical City 3
description: Two sides, two crystals

name: Brok the Investigator: The Brawl Bar
description: All-action additional content for BROK the InvestiGator. Fight your way through new enemies, tackle crazy challenges, and make new friends!

name: Idle Champions: Wyrm Slayer Ravengard Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Duke Ravengard (if you don't already have them) Wyrm Slayer Ravengard Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Duke Ravengard 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Duke Ravengard Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Le Mans Ultimate: BMW M Hybrid V8
description: The first in a new wave of Hypercars - BMW M Hybrid V8 available as FREE DLC! Download the BMW M Hybrid V8 and take to the track!

name: Money Simulator
description: Become a mogul in this thrilling simulation game! Buy, sell, and customize cars, trade in cryptocurrencies, and expand your empire with your very own shop. Take risks, make deals, and watch your business flourish in this dynamic world.

name: The Mythical City 2
description: Protect your city from evil!

name: Konon: Zew Choroszczy
description: A game about Konon, his arch-enemies, his missing friend, parcels with God's surprises and out-of-date ones (with peasant or children's inserts). Go in search of your nitro friend, fight your opponents, collect collectibles and unleash a mighty bang!

name: Shrineflow
description: Shrineflow is a multiplayer (1 vs 1) hide-and-seek game between a Kitsune and a Ninja. The Kitsune uses her magical abilities to track down her opponent. The Ninja uses his stealth skills to stay undetected while he collects enough to coins to break into the treasure trove.

name: The Ultimate Math Teaching Game
description: A Math game combined with a futuristic 3D gaming experience that will teach you Algebra, Geometry, and Trigonometry. You will properly understand these concepts and solidify them by solving practical problems. Start your science and engineering career with this game!

name: Steve's Warehouse
description: Steve's warehouse is a melting pot of physics, rogue-like and deckbuiling. Purchase objects, play them all and don't make any falls!

name: Pixel Playground
description: A little box of pixels I made specially for you :)

name: Bug Alliance
description: Bug Alliance is a pixel style top-down action RPG, where you play as bug warriors, each with unique abilities and weapons. Choose your Bug, select a game mode and dive into battles against worm tyranny. Fight, upgrade, farm resources, evolve and become a legend. Alliance is calling you!

name: Miner Tower Defense
description: This is a game that combines mining and tower defense elements. Players need to build defense towers by digging and gathering minerals underground to resist a constant stream of monsters!

name: Once in Hell
description: Once in Hell: I tried to create a game where i union History,Horror,Riddle and Parkour. In game u can use: Inventory,torch,flashlight and everything that can help you to survive. I am sure that, time you'll spend on a game will be enjoyable.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Human Klown Cosplay Pack
description: This DLC includes a full outfit, tops, bottoms, facepaints, and a Klown nose to bring it all together. All items are purely cosmetic and do not alter gameplay.

name: Fandom
description: "Fandom" is a psychological horror game played through a girl obsessed with celebrities. It explores the dark side of stalking and shows that obsession goes with terrible consequences.

name: Fishlets: Ocean Conservation 2024 Pack
description: Add four endangered marine critters to your aquariums in the Fishlets - Ocean Conservation 2024 Pack. Customize your saltwater tanks with the new Great Barrier Reef tank background and sand substrate. Care for the Giant Manta Ray, Red Handfish, Chinese Pufferfish, and Sunflower Sea Star!

name: 2D Top Racing
description: Get ready for heart-pounding action in 2D Top Racing! Choose from 12 unique cars, tackle 20 challenging tracks, and customize your ride for maximum performance. Compete against challenging AI in this adrenaline-fueled top-down racing game. Are you ready to claim victory?

name: King of Stocks
description: Welcome to King of Stocks! This is an engaging simulated stock trading game that allows you to experience the excitement and challenges of stock market investment. You can utilize your intelligence and insight to succeed in the market.

name: Only Way is Down
description: Embark on a purr-fectly perilous adventure as this lil kitty cat took an unfortunate cat-nap and ended up stranded sky high! With no way but down, unleash your feline agility and platforming prowess to navigate your descent through the urban jungle in this whimsical and gravity-defying escapade!

name: Fishing Planet: Japan Odyssey Pack
description: Get ready for a 60-day ocean odyssey to explore the surrounding waters of Kaiji No Ri island with the Japan Odyssey Pack. Bring along your friends on the luxurious Volans fishing yacht!

name: Dead Island 2: Expansion Pass
description: Dive back into the epic horror pulp adventure of Dead Island 2 with our Expansion Pass. Brace yourself for mayhem as you uncover more of Hell-A, with brand-new missions, caches of lethal weapons, skill cards to master, fresh fits, and all the zombies you can slay.

name: Graviteam Tactics: The Far Escape
description: Soviet troops of the SWF were encircled near Kiev. CMG Belov received the order of advance to the Romny to provide support to the encircled troops. In order to prevent a breakthrough of the encirclement ring, the German HQ strengthened the outer perimeter with elements of 10MID and MID SS "Reich".

name: Dead Island 2: Red’s Demise Katana
description: Slice through the zombie horde with the Red's Demise Katana, which earns you a temporary damage boost with every slay.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Steel Horse Carla
description: Slay in style with our premium character pack. Character Pack - Steel Horse Carla includes the Pantera Trueno costume and Van Flensing weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Venice Vogue Bruno
description: Slay in style with our premium character packs. Character Pack - Venice Vogue Bruno includes the Downtown Dandy costume and Skull Driver weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Cyber Slayer Amy
description: Slay in style with our premium character packs - Cyber Slayer Amy includes the Neurunner costume and the Casimir & Julienne weapons.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Jungle Fantasy Ryan
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Gaelic Queen Dani
description: Slay in style with our premium character pack. Character Pack - Gaelic Queen Dani includes the Thoroughly Modern Medb costume and the Brainzzz-Biter weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Silver Star Jacob
description: Slay in style with our premium character pack. Silver Star Jacob includes the Rodeo Sunset costume and Devil's Horseshoes weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Pulp Weapons Pack
description: The Pulp Weapons Pack features two signature weapons that are sure to leave a lasting impression - the Homewrecker and the Eye Opener.

name: Dead Island 2: Golden Weapons Pack
description: Our slayers don't understated and neither will you with the Golden Weapons Pack. Slay in style with the beautifully decorated Abuela's Ashes Mace and Sam B's One Hit Wonder Pistol.

name: Dead Island 2: Memories of Banoi Pack
description: Featuring weapons, skills and perks that celebrate the original Dead Island game, the Memories of Banoi pack is an essential addition to any Zombie Slayer's arsenal.

name: Convrgence: Supporter Pack
description: CONVRGENCE - Supporter Pack is little addition that mainly aimed at those who already own the game, but wish to support an indie solo developer a bit more nonetheless.

name: Sumerians: Assyrian Statues
description: Assyrian statues to decorate your cities.

name: Wild Card Football: Legacy WR Pack
description: Play as famed legacy Wide Receivers Cris Carter, Steve Smith Sr. and Andre Reed, along with their unique Wild Card outfits.

name: Lust Potions
description: Now that Lil' Dude has turned 30, he's decided to become a wizard and summon a succubus to take his virginity! Use alchemy to brew the potions and ingredients needed to summon and seduce each succubus. Can you help Lil' Dude get laid?

name: Stunts above Clouds 3
description: Welcome to Stunts Above Clouds 3, the thrilling conclusion to the epic series.

name: Red Ruins
description: Red Ruins is an asymmetric VR game created by students, where one player becomes a Demon Lord in VR, facing off against Heroes on PC. With powerful weapons and strategic gameplay, players must either vanquish their foes or join forces to conquer the Red Ruins together.

name: TranceWave Neo
description: tranceWave NEO is a classic arcade twin-stick shmup, inspired by others in the "trance shooter" genre. Move, shoot, survive, and aim for a high score!

name: Rose and Cross
description: Our main character, absorbed in the study of sects and the occult, made a big mistake by going to an abandoned farm.

name: Astro Looter
description: Astro Looter combines survival and tower defense gameplay. Play as heroes like Storm Striker across planets to seize minerals, using weapons and defenses to fight alien bugs. Upgrade gear with minerals and explore diverse planets. Notably challenging, few pass the first level.

name: Pampas & Selene: Supporter Pack
description:
This DLC offers extra content for Pampas & Selene that includes Skins, Pets, Special Games Modes, a Digital Game Manual, and a Special Developer OST. (Those who purchased and started the game in the first two weeks of it's release, aka Founders, already have this content as a bonus for free!)

This DLC includes:

Pets:
- Hada the Fairy
- Maggie the Cat
- Tod the Toad
- Cerdo the Pig

Skins:
- Porkchop [Pampas]
- Kleopatra [Selene]
- Cutezilla [Selene]

Game Modes:
- Explosions [Exploding Barrels!]
- Coins [No arrows or mana, only riches]
- Fast as wind [Run like the wind, unless you're hit!]
- Vampire [Drain life from kills and lose life over time]
- Hardcore Mode [You get one hit]

Special:
- A digital version of the GAME MANUAL from the MSX computer version of the game.
- A Developer OST where Fran, the developer, sings the entire soundtrack a capella.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Ranger - Fluxo
description: From the far reaches of space come the incredible Fluxo! Many humans will flee from this magician of death, only to find he always has tricks up his sleeve. Fluxo is a special character skin for the Ranger Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: Destiny 2: Legacy Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: SwapMeat
description: SWAPMEAT is a co-op third-person shooter where you raid the weirdest worlds and angriest aliens in the universe...for their meat. Swap meat with the enemies you defeat to steal their abilities and augment your hero on the fly, and fight alongside your friends to bring home the bacon.

name: Nightshift
description:
Nightshift is a simple, arcade collect 'em up Game Boy developed for the BeansJam '22. You are working nightshift and desperately try to stay awake.

Drink Kola to stay awake (you gain time). But be aware of hot milk with honey as it will make you drowsy (you lose time). When you run out of time, you will fall asleep. You move automatically, use the D-Pad (Arrow Keys) to change direction.

name: Rhythum
description: You are piloting the Orchestra’s new Rhythum mobile suit unit, when the ship you are on is attacked by a fleet of enemy suits known as the Conductors. Do you have what it takes to survive the Conductors’ attack?

name: Invasion of the Geminorons
description: Sin descripción

name: Turkey Man
