description: Your A Turkey From Space Trying To Stop A Company That's Trying To Kill You

name: Fog and Sea
description: You're from a world where the dead don't move on, they move out. Ghosts live in cities built on the backs of huge creatures. There's a process before you move where you get to choose where you end up, spend 3 days getting to know your perspective new neighborhoods (and maybe a little more) before you settle into the afterlife.

name: Goldorak
description:
The Alcorak was destroyed by Vega's forces.
Grendizer's mission is to travel to the four corners of the planet to find each piece of debris from the device in order to be able to reconstruct it.

During his journey, Goldorak will have to face many enemies.
At the end of each level, a part of the Alcorak will be won.
When all the parts of the Alcorak have been assembled, it will then be possible to start the game again on board.

name: Maid-san no Iru Kurashi S
description: Sin descripción

name: AUTS: The Ultimate Stress Relief Game
description: Sin descripción

name: A2: The Ultimate Sequel To AUTS
description: Sin descripción

name: Abducted: 10 Minutes!!!
description: Sin descripción

name: Kira Kano
description: Kira Kano is an upcoming visual novel developed by AZARASHI SOFTWARE in collaboration with Lump of Sugar to commemorate the latter's 10th anniversary that tells the story of Yuzuru, an ordinary student at first glance but he's actually famous on the Internet. His secret identity leaks to a classmate and she... asks to make her his apprentice.

name: ABM Command
description: Sin descripción

name: Light Snake
description: Sin descripción

name: Spin the Book
description: Sin descripción

name: The Breakup Arena
description: A Beat 'Em Up game where you confront your ex-lovers, blending intense action with deep emotional storytelling. Explore the complexities of relationships and discover inner peace through unique gameplay.

name: Darkwatch
description: Created by a 4 man team this short FPS puts you in the shoes of a Darkwatch agent fighting against mysterious creatures. With your loyal canine by your side, upgrade weapons, buy perks and fight the forces of darkness!

name: Memento Mori
description: A game for the ones we lost on the way. Memento Mori is a surreal walking simulator that combines a minimalistic art style and a show, don't tell story focused on dealing with loss.

name: How We Die
description: Pack your bag with good tools, modify your character's dice, and reach the end of the story.

name: Zapnator
description: Dodge and destroy enemies and asteroids to get food and grow bigger! Be careful though, the game only gets harder over time. Deal with incoming bosses and find yourself your own unique strategy with the attribute system! Change up the gameplay with different stages and characters to choose from!

name: Ikev
description: Ikev is a furniture assembling simulator in VR where the main antagonist is a lack of manuals! Be creative and resourceful, work through the incorrectly delivered orders, and stay diligent in furnishing your apartment.

name: Extreme Climbing
description: In extreme climbing, there are various well-known tower shaped buildings that are impossible or even prohibited to climb in reality, to challenge the natural reaction of fear of heights and fully enjoy the fun of climbing. Welcome everyone to experience "Extreme Climbing"!

name: Tragala
description: Tragala is a graphic adventure game in which you will play Kurt, a restless young man who tries to escape from the system house ruled by the junjuma, a control and blame machine that is part of a systematic and terrible monster known as Tragala.

name: The Watcher's Curse
description: Search for ancient knowledge, face off against the supernatural, and solve the mysteries plaguing the land of Hollow Veil. The forces of chaos are rising and you may be the only living being that can stop them. Traverse the world, level up, and face down esoteric horrors.

name: Arbor
description: Become an pioneer, overcome crises and colonize the island.

name: Cracker
description: Cracker is a fast-paced arcade game where you have to destroy as many blocks as possible before you run out of lives.

name: Monster Souls
description: Monster Souls is a turn-based sidescroller RPG where you play as a newbie adventurer who gets wrapped up in a grand quest because of a special power that renders him irresistible to monsters. Bang your buddies, get dominated by monsters, and gain cool powers!

name: Guardians of The AfterLife
description: Guardians of the Afterlife is an adventure to reclaim your existence, bridging the mystical divide between the afterlife and the physical world. Through strategic combat, puzzle-solving, and unraveling a rich narrative, uncover the secrets of your past and fight for a second chance at life.

name: Silks of Mind
description: Silks of Mind is a puzzle-platformer where you will use telekinetic powers to manipulate the environment. Guided by an ancestral spirit, a new guardian is summoned to the Sacred Lands, a mystical realm threatened by echoes of an ancient grudge.

name: Trailblazers: Into the March
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure in this roguelite colony-sim strategy game. Command your Landship in tactical battles, care for a crew composed of all sorts of characters, shape your home, manage resources, and lead expeditions into the March. Discover what lies at its heart... and in yours.

name: Devils Run
description: An indie platformer and race to escape an imploding planet! Time your moves carefully..

name: Dimension Pirates
description: Here is the ultimate, third-person bullet hell game. Help save the universe and humanity by blasting away a wide array of villains that are trying to take over multiple dimensions.

name: Soviet Anomaly 7
description: You are trapped in an endless soviet-era building.Observe your surroundings carefully to reach escape.Don't overlook any anomalies.If you find anomalies, turn back to downstairs.If you don't find anomalies, come to upstairs.

name: Rollz
description: ◆In a 3D fantastic distant universe and a mysterious atmosphere◆ An action game where you roll a ball through a beautiful 3D space and aim for the goal. Clear each stage while navigating through various obstacles.

name: Lamplight
description: Lamplight is a 3D mind-bending puzzle platformer where you defy gravity and warp your perception. Navigate a labyrinth of rooms where walls become floors, ceilings become pathways, and time bends unexpectedly. Unravel the secrets hidden within this distorted world - are you ready to be challenged?

name: Stop The F
description: "Stop The F" - a satire game on the endlessly unreleased remakes of one famous cancelled game, in the genre of puzzles created through the prism of many kinds of humor. The project is unique in its playability. In addition to the already known mechanics, there will be much more new ones in the game.

name: Get Up In The Night
description: "Get Up In The Night" tells a sci-fi story set in the future, filled with dark humor. An old man wakes up in a completely unfamiliar place... His bladder can no longer hold, and he must rush to the bathroom! But what exactly is going on? What secrets are hidden within all this?

name: Lunia Record
description: Originally an ordinary adventure life, after meeting a problem person, the brother and sister stepped into a magnificent and extraordinary world.

name: System Malfunction
description: "System Malfunction" is a first-person horror game set in a mysterious building. The player takes on the role of a security guard who witnesses strange occurrences during the night shift. In a fear-inducing environment, the player explores the building to uncover hidden truths.

name: Legend Square
description: Rubik's Cube + Chess + Roguelike = ?Playing chess on a Rubik's Cube? And I brought a shotgun?--They say I'm not fit for this prison--A prison for the guilty--I agree--But they only got it half right--I can twist this space with ease--Leaving here is a piece of cake for me!

name: Vampdoll: The Blood-Drinking Maidens
description: A visual novel game featuring a pure love girls' love story bound by blood, with the concept of "Vampires x Military Uniforms x girls' love (yuri) ."

name: Yvy
description: An adventure autobattler game based on customizable dice rolls and rogue-lite elements, inspired by real events in 16th century Brazil. Build your own dice, strategically choosing each face, and defend the region of Pindó from the Whitecloak invaders!

name: Alpha and Iota
description: Alpha and Iota is a puzzle platformer about repairing a computer system inhabited by sentient agents. You operate a repair core, which can navigate the system by ejecting between a variety of different host types. Some hosts are fixed in place, while others jump, slide, climb walls, or follow rails.

name: Snatch & Swallow
description: This is an action rougelike game Players need to strategically select possession objects while also selecting various beneficial gain attributes that benefit them.

name: Within the Vault
description: Within The Vault is an action packed isometric roguelite with a heavy influence from classic film noire. Featuring dynamic dialogue, energetic big band inspired tracks, a variety of ranged and melee weapons to choose from, and unlockable permanent upgrades for endless fun.

name: Exorcise
description: Exorcise is the first title of ( The Hell + Me ) game series. In this game you In an underground place occupied by demons you must try to survive and find your way by solving puzzles and destroying the demons. Are you ready for an exorcism?

name: Cook For Love
description: Win the hearts of Parisians with your cooking, discover delicious recipes, and become a chef worthy of working onboard the Orient Express.

name: RPM: Road Punk Mayhem
description: Hit the road for explosive bullet hell action through a post-apocalyptic wasteland!

name: Goblin Auto Club Manager
description: Imagine building fantastic cars out of scrap metal and letting idiots drive them. Goblin Auto Club Manager is a wacky racing management simulation. Buy parts from the junkyard, build cars with them and choose your racing strategy. Your crazy goblins do the driving. Keep fingers crossed...

name: Nethack
description: Unravel cyber secrets and foil mass surveillance as a skilled hacker in NetHack. Challenge authority, rewrite the rules, and emerge as the ultimate digital rebel.

name: The Tortoise and the Hare
description: Explore a retelling of the classic Aesop Fairy Tale. A songbird, named Simon, narrates the tale, bringing the story alive one word at a time. The experience is fully animated and voiced with an easy to digest story mode and lots of bonuses and secrets to discover!

name: Proto Garden
description: From a single beehive, pollinate your way to planetary regeneration. Grow flowers, automate honey production, and research new plants to assist the bees. Optimize your garden, paint new terrain, and watch the land come to life!

name: Sequence
description: Sequence is a dice-based poker game, multiplayer & competitive, inspired by the classics Generala/Yahtzee/Yacht/Yatzy (every area of the world has a name for the game!). Now, players from all over the world can compete to climb the ranks - will you become a Senior Master?

name: Power Grid
description: Dive into the world of the energy industry with the Power Grid app, designed by award-winning author Friedemann Friese.

name: Hell On Earth
description: Immerse yourself in a captivating world where demons have begun to invade the surface of Earth. Join a holy faction as you battle endless hordes of demons, purging them from your infested lands. Venture forth and unravel the mystery behind their overwhelming presence.

name: Matreshka
description: Matreshka is a first-person psychological horror experience, you must navigate a maze of old soviet building by elevator. Searching for a way to escape.

name: Lost Lullabies: The Orphanage Chronicles
description: "Lost Lullabies - The Orphanage Chronicles" is a Co-Op horror game set in 1980, inspired by the real stories of an orphanage ruined by a fire in 1960 Lowell. Playable with 1-4 players, the goal is to identify and expel malevolent spirits alone or with your team.

name: Happy Corner
description: The corner everyone dream for, fight for. Frustration, anger should not stop your step. Everything, just for the one moment.

name: Too Late Forest
description: "Too Late Forest" is a belt-scrolling adventure game in which a boy navigates his way through a mysterious forest. The deeper the boy goes into the forest, the more his body gradually transforms into a beast, and by turning back at any time, the ending will branch out.Can you lead him to happiness?

name: Carbon
description: Carbon is Action RPG set in cyberpunk/biopunk world. Create your path to power through 18 uniquely themed specializations in the passive skill tree. Carbon is developed by a team of industry veterans and ARPG enthusiasts who have long felt that the sci-fi theme was underrepresented in this genre.
Embark on a journey of Zen riddles in a Buddhist mandala space. Reach Nirvana with a 1 in 8192 chance in a mystical world adorned with tombstones and Buddha statues.

name: Spiritmorph
description: A Monster collecting simulator game! Buy, Play, Pet, and Feed up to 12 monsters known as Spiritmorph!

name: Reverb
description: Reverb is a multiplayer PVPVE extraction stealth shooter with a first-person perspective, set in a fictional Biopunk universe where there is a constant struggle for evolution.

name: Port of Jumanah
description: 'Port of Jumanah’ is a retro pixel-style underwater adventure with rogue-lite elements. Meet quirky characters, explore unique places, and encounter unusual sea life. Treasures and troubles await in these seas! Are you ready to dive into the unknown? Lovely mermaids and menacing sharks await!

name: Potion Punch Rivals
description: Potion Punch Rivals puts your shopkeeping, potion punching skills to the test. Race against your rival to see who can take orders first, prep fastest, and serve best.

name: Fix-It Felix Sr.
description: Fix-it Felix Sr. is a parody remake of the game Fix-It Felix Jr. featured in the Disney film Wreck-It Ralph. Fix-It Felix Sr. is a simple, colorful, and fun arcade game.

name: Sundae Picnic
description:
· Make and sell ice cream in the park!

You can make various flavors of soft ice cream from vanilla, mint, chocolate to strawberry, matcha.
We should also have toppings such as rainbow sprinkles, chocolate chips, wafer stick and cherries, right?

· Be friends with cats and dogs

There are cats & dogs all over the park.
Please make ice cream. If the animals liked the ice cream you made, they might come to the picnic :)

Sometimes some animals are picky, so keep that in mind!

· Make your own picnic

Picnic mats, beach beds, swimming pools, BBQ party grills, and more than 100 kinds of picnic furniture, fences and tiles are prepared. Decorate it according to your preference.
Note that there are some furniture that animals especially like! Don't forget to decorate it with it :D

name: Minesweeper
description: A minesweeper homebrew for the ColecoVision.

name: Crimson Temple
description: It is a vanilla DOOM 2 styled map with a bit of atmosphere, some custom atmospheric BGM and a lot of secrets, including a hidden exit - though that exit doesn't lead anywhere special for now, this is just a single map. Id say its between Doom 2 and Plutonia in general difficulty, and takes between 30 minutes and 1 hour to complete.

name: Devil.., Heart and Possession
description:
"If I had known this would happen, I would have killed you then, with my own hands."

Dangerous and mesmerizing demons have appeared before you in Hell after an unexplained death.

To escape Hell, you must steal their hearts!

"A kiss would be tempting, don't you think?"

With demons constantly coveting your body,
can you escape Hell in one piece?

name: Kebab World
description: Sin descripción

name: Goblin Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: The Nine Tailed Celestial Fox
description: It's a sandbox cultivation game where players recruit and train talents, build their own homesteads, practice alchemy and crafting, battle monsters, and collect materials. The combat mode features automatic side-scrolling battles with companions, meanwhile player can click cards to execute attacks.

name: Sweet Forest
description: Sweet Forest - is a simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photo in the gallery.

name: AnimalLaboratory
description: Far out in outer space, there is an experimental base where aliens use a catalyst to transform humans into animals to satisfy their needs. Here, you are a human who has escaped from a laboratory and explores the game levels while avoiding enemies.

name: Coin Eruption
description: Experience the thrill of a mountain-top coin pusher game in Coin Eruption! Drop coins, collect special upgrades, unlock rewards, and trigger epic volcano eruptions. Customize your game with avatars and backgrounds while leveling up through dynamic and exciting gameplay.

name: Pacification Light
description: Pacification Light is an exciting 2D platformer that takes us back to a time when spirits and ghosts inhabited our world. During this period, there lived a brave hero who decided to confront the darkness and cleanse the earth of sinister supernatural entities.

name: SkyNuggets
description: Click to fly and avoid Obstacles, increasing your score.

name: Heaven Seeker: The Savior of This Cruel World
description: "Heaven Seeker: The Savior of This Cruel World" is a twin-stick rogue-lite shooter where you take your own shot at the castle in the sky! A dungeon with a different structure each time you enter, a variety of magic bullets - and a formidable barrage of bullets - await you.

name: The Final Keeper
description: You are the last surviving keeper, tasked with the recovery of the relics dropped by your fellow fallen keepers. Explore a fully destructible dark fantasy post apocalyptic world, as you fight your way towards redemption.

name: Dark the Dead
description: Dark the Dead is an exciting game where you take on the role of a hidden wanderer who goes to meet an elder to receive a new task. The elder's magic coins were stolen, and your main goal is to return them.

name: Demon Slayer
description: Demon Slayer - Set in the year 2075, when dark demons have invaded the world and threaten all of humanity. You will play the role of the leader of a group of killers, whose goal is to destroy demons and collect their analyzes to ensure the survival of humanity.

name: Kokoronull
description: "Kokoronull" is a hardcore action game that adds the element of "slipperiness" to the usual platform action gameplay. Conquering all 25 stages is an impressive achievement.

name: Ninja 1987
description: Ninja 1987 is a dive back into the past with the most authentic 8-bit side-scrolling action-platformer. Use shinobi skills to thwart a nefarious threat and rediscover all the adrenaline of timeless classics!

name: Pixel Quest: Lost Relics
description: Join Eva and Pobextil in their journey in this pixel platformer adventure!

name: Shenaniganza
description: Outsmart friends in goofy hide-and-seek with crazy power-ups, vibrant cartoon aesthetics, and endless laughter. Form alliances, betray buddies, and experience multiplayer mayhem in this unpredictable, entertaining game. Get ready for a bonanza of fun – where laughs never stop!

name: Hentai Puzzle: Girls
description: Hentai Puzzle: Girls is a fun puzzle game that tests your intelligence and attention! Create wonderful images by correctly combining jigsaw puzzles in this game featuring colorful and attractive anime girls.

name: Kuiper Belt Survivor
description: Kuiper belt survivor is an arcade style bullet heaven, where every run is endless. It brings a unique spin to the bullet heaven genre by making every part of the players weapon arsenal customizable with well over 10,000 unique weapons to build, and unique stats for every enemy.

name: Turtle River RPG
description: Turtle River is a punishing, loot-based, JRPG dungeon crawler. Enter the deadly forest of Chedone to rescue the Arch-Phrenic and save Turtle River.

name: Kappa's Asylum
description: Kappa's Asylum is a survival horror game in which you control a youtuber in an abandoned asylum to record a video.

name: Continuum
description:
Fight as far as you can into an endless series of simulations in this sci-fi arcade shooter with roguelike elements.

CONTINUUM is an arcade FPS with rogue-like elements that puts the player in control of a synthetic avatar, tasked with completing combat simulations in an effort to gather data for a powerful and unknown intelligence.

name: Hunter Legends
description: RPG game and Open World,in this game ,you kill monsters and beast of prey，and some small games can play.

name: Tales of the Tavern
description: Explore and protect Neverue in "Tales of the Tavern," a fantasy ARPG that mixes intense combat with cozy life-sim elements like cooking and farming. Play as Gwen, mastering culinary magic to enhance her abilities.

name: Romanizer
description: Immerse yourself in Roman history with this management game! Gain acceptance of the goddess Cybele into the pantheon of Roman gods, influence public opinion, and go through many historical events. Will you be able to get Cybele adopted by the Romans?

name: Mafia Simulator
description: Rise as a crime lord in "Mafia Simulator" : A simulation game blending action, strategy, and an open world. Conquer the city by managing illicit businesses like weed farms, weapons manufacturing and cocaine trading, and make decisions that could mean life or death.

name: Apano Syn Fighter
description: Is there a gamepad lying around somewhere?!! Ready to play some real shooter games again? Grab the controller and become an APANO SYN PILOT to face the alien invasion. Connect up to four controllers and shoot until you drop. 100% survival chance on "Easy", low on "Impossible".

name: Volcanewt
description: Volcanewt is an action city destruction game where the goal is annihilation. Destroy the city, defeat the WWDF and their creations, and save? the Hawiwi Archipelago.

name: Wizard Pulse
description: Wizard Pulse is a casual shooter game about wizards. Shoot through hordes of enemies and unlock new abilities.

name: Dark Crown
description: Dark Crown is a roguelike deckbuilder where a new take on chess meets powerful magical abilities. It's a gloomy and oppressive world, but one that you will conquer by unlocking new cards, improving units, making sacrifices, and tough choices to grow more powerful with each new run.

name: Spec
description: A series of classic arcade style game modes that will test your skill, puzzle-solving, and reaction. There are 66 levels to conquer across 11 different game modes, secrets to discover along the way, bonus modes to unlock... you'll be surprised how much can be packed into one little spec.

name: Apocalypse Delivery Service
description: Apocalypse Delivery Service is an exciting survival and adventure game. You will enter a post-apocalyptic world where you play as a courier delivering packages. But don't think it will be easy! Your task is to find necessary items, survive, and most importantly, escape from the city.

name: Insert Item Apocalypse
description: Insert Item Apocalypse - interactive 3D puzzle in genre "find and click". Explore a world full of many details, conveying the spirit of the aftermath of a major man-made disaster.

name: Medival Hustle
description: Madival Hustle is a captivating 3D medival-quest game, where you will immerse yourself in a world of fantasy landscapes, where every hill and castle hides its own secrets and adventures. Follow the storyline completing the quests and find out what awaits you in the finale.

name: Z Rush
description: Z Rush is an exciting strategic 3D game where your task is to place zombies in such a way that they can destroy all the turrets on the level.

name: Leguiumz Experience
description: The official game to interact with Leguiumz Twitch Channel. Come and play with the other viewers, in an endless battle for fame, and request priority on the stream ! Multiple game modes, to make the stream even crazier than before !

name: Keep Runnin
description: Keep Runnin is a 2D sidescrolling parkour-platformer game where you navigate through various, visually stunning environments, overcome obstacles, and evade unexpected hazards. Test your reflexes and embrace the excitement of a high-stakes chase in this exhilarating adventure.

name: Meadow Assault
description: Embark on an epic journey of survival and adventure alone or with up to 4 players online. Cultivate crops, trade for upgrades, and battle your way through the dense forest to uncover the mysterious maze and its secrets. But be vigilant, for danger lurks where least expected.

name: My Bath Tub Companion
description: My Bath Tub Companion is a free experience, to induce a calm & peaceful (and mildly horny) feeling. You'll feel satisfied sitting back, feel yourself relax as you watch her relax. Relaxation is the key to a blissful bath tub experience. Calm music & a beautiful girl to look at.

name: Mobiles Tycoon
description: Mobiles Tycoon is a brand new game about creating your mobile devices: smartphones and tablets. In the game you have to manage your company and develop your devices (smartphones and tablets), operating systems and processors

name: Emlis
description: Play as Emlis, a slime, explore an interconnected world, and fight enemies using elemental powers. Recover stolen elemental spirits from invaders to save the corrupted forest Soleen. Uncover secrets, defeat bosses, restore spirits to bring back life.

name: Toilet Zone
description: Pilot a flying toilet and avoid hitting the walls and enemies. Can you make it to the end?

name: Takeover
description: Takeover is a fast paced waifu hack and slash action game with a time attack feature. You will alternate stealth phase and combat phase. The game include a dynamic clothes system.

name: Moonshine Madness
description: A competitive 8 player racing game which contains items that can be used as well as interactive objects and randomized map events. The game has online matchmaking and custom lobbies so no worries! You will always find someone to play with!

name: The Origin Theory: Episode One
description: Origin Theory episode one is a lighthearted story driven survival horror experience. Game has it's classic bad guy, zombies, guns and nasty stuff, but the emphasis is on unraveling the mystery and not grinding down hordes of enemies and surviving bullet soaking boss fights.

name: Miglorn
description: Gather resources and strategically build up your Viking settlement by day, fortifying it to withstand the relentless onslaught of skeletons by night

name: Relaxing Time: Paradise Resort - Collector's Edition
description: Prepare for a holiday experience that doesn't require leaving your home and dive into a captivating hidden object games adventure at Silver Oasis!

name: Rise of the Bugs
description: RISE OF THE BUGS is a 2D pixel art adventure game about annoying bugs. Lead a colony in search of new food, discover the secrets of mutation and escape from the angry men on the kitchen. Will you be able to steal the mysterious sauce or you die crushed under a slipper?

name: Sleep Simulator
description: Welcome to the world of "Sleep Simulator," where you will immerse yourself in the fascinating and hyper-realistic world of sleep.

name: Speed Run
description: Speed Run is a first person platform video game, each level is full of traps, obstacles and fatal falls that you must avoid at all costs. Each level has its unique theme with different music and environments. The objective of the game is that you can complete the levels as quickly as possible!

name: AI Confidential
description: Artificial Intelligence, Real Problems: You are Makenzy Turner, an affable RoboTechnician employed by AI megacorp, Indelligent Solutions. With your trusty assistant ARI, use high-tech tools and old-fashioned empathy to mend everything from broken parts to broken hearts.

name: Listen, Think, Meow!
description: Listen, Think, Meow! is an audiobook with missing words. If you can't find the word then its time to start meowing for the hint. Oh and if you are struggling you might need a "meow".

name: Detective School Club
description: Welcome to the Detective Club! Led by the troublesome and shy president Alice Baskerville. Follow this comedy story where together you will solve cases using your deductive powers!

name: Mazaica
description: Extend all lines from numbers to fill up the grids. Puzzles are sometimes meditative. Yet often challenging.

name: Glusiverse
description: Help GlusiGlusi in this adventure to find the remedy to his master illness.

name: Kiteboarding
description: Experience the exhilaration of Kiteboarding as you ride the waves, performing thrilling jumps and tricks propelled by the wind.

name: Metal Queen Dungeon
description: Defend the Metal Queen Dungeon! Adventurers have set out to raid your very existence. So build up your evil army, make customizations to your deck with powerful minion and spell cards, and remind those wannabe heroes that in your dungeon, the prison cells stay empty and the riffs are heavy.

name: Flashlight Sim
description: A flashlight-based simulation game with various elements such as combat and puzzles which will test your sense of direction and your worthiness. The best simulation out there! Guaranteed to change your life as well as those around you!

name: Playable Alpha
description: Surviving a post-catastrophic event, your mission is to survive. In this VR First Person Looter Shooter, you will get weapons, gear, upgrade it and have fun blasting them aliens to shreds.

name: Idle Waters
description: A relaxing idle fishing game that waits for you at the bottom of the screen while you do other things. CATCH, COLLECT and DISPLAY fishes!

name: Cat Test Lab: Multiplayer Contest Arena
description: Create a spectacular cat and put it to the test in our competitive arenas! Play alone or with up to 7 friends to earn medals, discover secrets, and receive letters from adoring cat fans as your cat becomes more impressive and popular!"

name: Silent Frontiers
description: A Gripping 2D Side-Scrolling Strategy Tower Defense Extravaganza. In this forgotten frontier, you become the final line of defense for your city, warding off relentless hordes of monstrous invaders. This is not just a battle for survival; it's a supreme test of wit and strategy.

name: Fish Idle 2
description: Catch fish idle on a hook in the fish kingdoms and become an idle fish tycoon.

name: Haunted Record
description: A 20 minute story about a mysterious ghost and an even more mysterious journalist.

name: Cain x Nica
description: ‘Cain × Nica’ is a visual novel about a pointless struggle doomed to failure from the start. But... doesn't that just make it more beautiful? The game features animated CGs and character sprites, a huge number of locations and soundtracks. Game length: 10-12 hours.

name: Into the Wild
description: Into the Wild is a tense yet tranquil survival game where nature holds nothing back. Inspired by the Norwegian hinterlands, the haunting valley of Jegersdal offers a faithful survival experience. Witness the magnificent aurora and search for answers amid the ruins of yesterday.

name: Whisper Forest
description: Whisper Forest is a Japanese-style horror game where "Nesting creatures." lurks. Players collect Amulets and offer them to lanterns.

name: Squares of Hell
description: Hell is divided into squares for sinners. For each sin there is a separate square. Bad smoker square - smoker is tempted by unavailable cigarettes. Bad Driver Square - The driver is always pushing the car uphill. Those who make a lot of noise jump up and down on a large subwoofer.

name: Pickup Point Simulator
description: Become an entrepreneur and develop your retail outlet. Order goods and place them in the warehouse, give orders to customers by scanning QR-code, design and expand your premises, hire employees and learn new skills!

name: Aldora
description: You've left your home island for the vast continent of Arronia. Starting with nothing, gather resources, craft, and build your home, or explore new lands. Can you thrive and make a name for yourself in this world?

name: The Shadows Within: Nightmare's Game
description: In this survival horror game, players guide Andrea after she receives a distressing call from her ex-girlfriend, setting off a chain of events resulting in her abduction. Stranded in the enigmatic Ebonvale, Andrea fights for survival against an unknown foe.

name: Rogue Robot: Escape Protocol
description: Take control of a little red robot on a daring mission to escape a factory filled with deadly traps, relentless enemies, and multiple paths in this roguelike platformer that blends fast-paced action with intense gameplay

name: Fantasy Tower
description: Game Purpose：Who can take the least days, Way up HT tower top? We tell you: You're buy the future of this game HT Version 1.0, Only Support to 5 floor Least a week or month, we will update and add some feature.

name: Jugs Bay
description: Prepare for sexy adventure in Jugs Bay, a captivating visual novel full of engaging encounters and vibrant characters. Play as a likable young man exploring a new world full of opportunities, hot encounters and romance.

name: Veil: Tactics
description: VEIL: Tactics is a turn-based strategy game set in an alternative world of today. Lead your squad of humans and other fantastical characters through missions to save two worlds - ours, and the world of Fantasy.

name: Hidden Wings and Paws
description: Cute little animals hid in different parts of the world. Can you find them all?

name: Pixel Hunt
description: Use unique cursors to find and fix simulated defective pixels on your desktop in this relaxing hidden object game. Enjoy multiple singleplayer modes and online multiplayer with friends, exploring others' desktops or inviting them to yours. Become a pixel hunter!

name: Separated
description: Separated is a 2-player horror co-op escape room experience. You and your friend were separated by a blind entity and your only hope of escape is to communicate to solve mind-boggling puzzles. But beware! The entity is always listening.

name: Universe Unknown
description: A third person, sci-fi, looter shooter. Reclaim earth from robotic enemies. Level up, gain skill abilities, and fight for the right of our very existence.

name: Flight Risk
description: Fight Risk is a minimalistic desk job game where you play as an air traffic controller trying to save a rogue flight. Master the communication systems before it's too late, or just wing it and see what happens!

name: Paranormal Power
description: "paranormal power" is a 2D Chinese folk fantasy style adventure storyline game. Players take on the role of a Taoist disciple accidentally stumbles into a dangerous county. Players can fight against various demons and monsters, or make choices that affect the subsequent storyline

name: The Fast and the Flirtatious: LA Drift
description: “The Fast and the Flirtatious: LA Drift” is a Yuri Dating Sim that delves into the LA underground racing and drifting subculture but also explores the thriving lesbian dating scene that flourishes in this community.

name: River God: Enshrouded Current
description: Embark on a journey with "River God: Enshrouded Current," where an ancient village battles a curse woven into its very fabric. Uncover the secrets of a malevolent priest whose dark rituals connect the village to a realm beyond life.

name: GooGooRise
description: Reaching the top is just the beginning. Don't fear failure; you can always start over. Climb upwards with all you've got!

name: AtooB
description: This is a game where you move 5 boxes. Move it from the first point to the next point, and then back to the first point. That's just the game.

name: Spine & Quill
description: Take up spine and quill in defense of your homeland of New Rodentia! Control the fight with a unique physics based combat system that spotlights the spear. Follow the story of Quillary and Itsy on their quest, battle robots, bugs, and more in this indie action game.

name: Styria
description: Humanity has become cattle for vampires. For trying to change this, you pay with the blood of your friends. ARPG Styria offers unique combat styles for each type of enemy and immerses you in an original world with steampunk vampires. Explore, kill, and choose your path!

name: Ball Bulét
description: Ball Bulét is an isometric Bullet Hell in which a girl searches for revenge by fighting security guards with...a bouncing ball?! Perform ricochet with your spherical weapon against walls and enemies; Reach the top of the company’s skyscraper and "talk" with the CEO who’s ruining your career.

name: Lost Mastery
description: Roguelike deckbuilding meets memory gameplay. Embark on an adventure in Lost Mastery, a unique blend of card battles, memory gameplay and strategy. Collect powerful cards, battle mysterious enemies and uncover hidden secrets. Can you master the game?

name: Casino Rogue
description: Casino Rogue is a poker inspired roguelike card game in which you play with familiar playing cards and leverage special Chips and Stamps to gain points and reach for the highest level you can. What will your Casino Rogue Level be?

name: An Archers Fate
description: Explore the lands of Sophiza and defeat monsters with various arrow types and abilities. Traverse on treacherous platforms with your mobility skills. Go on an epic adventure about a young archer to put an ancient evil back in its cage.

name: Come Home: Ghost Stories from Bangladesh
description: Young Saif loved going for walks with his dad in the forests of Bangladesh. On one of these walks, however, they became separated and Saif was left alone. What he encountered that day would reveal secrets about his home that, sooner or later, would need to be confronted.

name: Irang
description: Under the tyranny of the four-throated, magic collapsed and darkness fell. Irang embarks on a journey to find her missing family and uncover her birth's secret. In a Metroidvania-style adventure, she explores a decayed world, enhances envoy powers, and aims to restore the lost light.

name: Blind Jump
description: A brutally difficult platformer where all the platforms are invisible. Use your slime to unveil the platforms and carefully jump your way to the top.

name: Lappelduvide
description: A VHS-style found footage, analog, psychological horror game about the experience of one of the extreme cases of the virus that was left untreated.

name: Ladder it Up!
description: One guy, one ladder, and a tower you must get to the top of. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure to the top in a platformer that demands patience and precision, filled with diverse environments and various challenges!

name: Vale
description: Fight your way to dominion over the universe in this Shoot Em Up game based on the book! On the planet Vale, known for its extreme cold and endless snowfields, the story follows young Talen Esko and his sister Salla, whose family, the Esko clan, is transferred to govern this icy world.

name: Unbox the Room
description: Unbox the Room is a relaxing puzzle game where you unpack and arrange items and furniture in your new home. Create a cozy space by placing everything just right, from the smallest cup to the largest sofa.

name: Everchained
description: Defeat bosses & harvest trinkets. Feed it shards & get fed upgrades. For it is your Master! Rise and follow the path, Soul of the Great Hero...

name: Runecraft
description: An endless labyrinth of runic puzzles.

name: Border Dungeon
description: "Border Dungeon" is an incremental adventure game where players choose from warrior, mage, or rogue classes. They battle monsters and bosses in endless dungeons, upgrading skills and gear for endless adventure fun.

name: Purry & Panther: Lost in Helsinki
description: Purry and Panther have gone missing in Helsinki. Investigate the sights around the city and talk to the locals to help you on the case. Find Purry and Panther before they get into even more trouble.

name: Justin Freeman's Build A House
description: In this satirical RPG parody of the house-building genre, hapless millennial Guy struggles against government corruption and a recessive 20-teens economy to get an education, hold down a job, marry his sweetheart, and most importantly, build a house.

name: Midnight Syndrome
description: A summer night consumes the girls... Exploration type horror ADV game

name: Synthroute 82
description: Solo infinite destruction racing game

name: Panthalassa
description: Panthalassa is a Point and click and visual novel set in an underwater alien world. You play as an AI trying to uncover the memories of their body's previous owner. The game makes you experience the world through different user interfaces, where the physical and digital worlds collide.

name: BreakBall
description: Shoot your friends with balls that bounce off walls in this fast-paced tactical arena fighter. Discover dozens of modifiers and millions of combinations, and beat your friends by being the fastest to adapt to the ever-changing rules!

name: Project: Nova
description: Project: NOVA is a VR Puzzle game centred around the feelings of astrophobia and isolation. As an engineer it's your duty to repair the ship. On your voyage you will be faced with puzzles and decisions which will determine the fate of everyone onboard. Will the passengers survive... will you?

name: Reflex Unit: Strike Ops
description: Tactical Helicopter Action! Featuring diverse missions; stage daring rescues, manage resources, assault enemy bases and fight back against a sinister enemy. Strategic single and multiplayer gameplay, balance your aircrafts speed, firepower, fuel and load capacity to overcome challenging missions.

name: Rapture Recovery Squad
description: Rapture Recovery Squad is a dungeon crawling, deck building auto-battler. Map out the depths beneath humanity's last refuge and build up your roster of psionically charged fighters to prevent the end of the world.

name: The Book of Warriors 2: Reborn
description: "The Book of Warriors 2: Reborn" is a roguelike game blending deep narrative with tactical strategy. As a mysterious Soul Controller, explore past souls in a universe where apocalypse meets fairy tales. Ready to unveil apocalyptic secrets and command souls? Embark and let rebirth begin!

name: Rune Stones
description: Rune Stones - An exciting 3D logic puzzle! A mysterious and enigmatic island opens before you, filled with puzzles that you have to solve!

name: Eversiege
description: Eversiege is a roguelike, tower defense in which you'll defend a castle in procedurally generated terrain. Establish a production, build defending buildings and survive waves of enemies coming from everywhere! After defeat, buy new buildings, unlock new leaders and prepare to fight again.

name: Super Hero I.T. Software
description: You are the I.T. Department's lowest paid security grunt, and a hacker is malware-bombing the company network. Your shift ends in an hour. The break room coffee pot is cold. Log in, 'cause it's gonna be a long night.

name: SkyCop
description: Welcome to the year 2080! The number of unemployed and criminals is skyrocketing, but we won't let it happen. This is where Project SkyCop comes in - an elite unit of police officers who can take on anything.

name: Paranormal Place
description: Alex is a blogger who explores places with paranormal phenomena. At the request of his subscribers, he goes to an abandoned place where, according to rumors, some creepy things were noticed. What is happening there? You have to find it out.

name: Forgotten 23
description: Space station Forgotten is in a decaying orbit and engineer Max Novak is the only hope of averting catastrophe with only 23 minutes and endless time loops to spare. Navigate a dark sci-fi adventure, learn more with every loop, solve challenging problems, and uncover the dark secret of the Forgotten.

name: Middle Ages: Peasants & Knights
description: Survive in an open world inspired by 14th century Europe. Immerse yourself in crafting based on real historical methods and experience true inventory system and realistic resource management. Take control of your destiny and embrace a world full of possibilities.

name: OutRoad Fury
description: Fight demonic hordes and drive your van in search of weapons and resources to destroy the gate of hell, all in a metal atmosphere !

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Animals 4
description: Puzzles of Random Animals!

name: Chou à la Crème Collect
description: A sweet and poignant cream puff adventure to save another self who has lost their sense of taste. An emotional story you won't want to miss until the very end.

name: 100 Egypt Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in Egypt, full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Egypt locations as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

name: 2351: Apocalypsis
description: Fight against humanity. This 3d mech brawler pits you against 6 opponents before you face the ultimate boss. Use your weapon, rockets and melee abilities to defeat your opponents across 6 stages.

name: 6-Sided Stories
description: A short and cozy puzzler with chill lofi beats: flip the puzzle pieces and colour them correctly to reveal the full picture! Discover how each image leads into the next, following a crew of adorable animals as they make friends and have wholesome adventures.

name: 8minSurvival
description: It is a top-down shooting game where you have to survive for 8 minutes from pursuing enemies to clear the game.

name: Aaero2
description: Speed through stunning alien worlds tracing ribbons of light to release the energy in the music. Fly solo or team up with a friend. Encounter strange enemies and giant boss creatures. Unleash devastating missile barrages and rain heavy cannon fire to the beat of the epic soundtrack from Monstercat.

name: Aberrant Nights
description: Aberrant Nights is a first-person psychological horror game. The protagonist will travel to a suburban gas station in the middle of the night to become a part-time gas station worker.

name: A Chronicle of Occultism in Skinnerburg
description: "A Chronicle of Occultism in Skinnerburg" is a text adventure game that attempts to explore the possibilities of combining literature and gaming by driving gameplay through character building and environmental interactions and by hosting the narrative experience in novelistic and poetic texts. Explore Skinnerburg, a place where witchcraft traditions coexist with modern life, and interact with a wide variety of environments and characters, triggering literary and readable poetic texts, building character personalities and idiosyncratic tendencies, and experiencing the joy of maneuvering through a unique point-and-click combat and interaction system.

name: Adrift
description: Casual Single Player Space Fishing Game

name: Airport Antiterror
description: This is an exciting 3D shooter game set in an airport that has become the center of a zombie apocalypse. You will have to fight hordes of zombies, gather resources, and build a plane to escape. But will you be able to?

name: America's Next Top Pornstar
description: You're the newest star on the rise in the world of porn, but you'll have to earn your spot at the top! Use your mouth, hands and a legendary cock to climb the ranks all the way up from a lowly amateur to the very heights of porn stardom. Do you have what it takes to be America's Next Top Pornstar!?

name: A Stranded Spark
description: Explore the Forgotten Island in this small open-world cozy adventure game! Follow the story of Guina walking around the island, meeting new characters, helping them and trying to find a way back home through a wholesome and cute story.

name: Astral Maze: Escape the Horror
description: "Astral Maze: Escape the Horror" is a first-person horror game. Be attentive and careful, enemies may chase you. Look for the keys and find a way out of the maze.

name: Astera
description: Step into Astera, a steampunk-infused fantasy world. Play your way in this fast-paced Action RPG featuring dual class specialization, rogue-like dungeons, a vast open world to explore and co-operative multiplayer. Crafted with passion by a dedicated team of action RPG enthusiasts.

name: Assemble!
description: 3, 2, 1, Assemble! Dive into an exciting 3D puzzle game where you connect individual pieces to complete 3D models. Explore the challenge across three difficulty levels and assemble detailed 3D models piece by piece to reveal the complexity and beauty of each finished structure.

name: Assassin's Alliance
description: It is an immersive storyline puzzle game designed specifically for players who love rich storylines.

name: Asteros
description: Asteros is a Sci-Fi third person action rogue-like where intense gunfights and complex combat await. Sent to eliminate an unknown threat in a research facility on the titular planet, you'll encounter hostile forces and uncover hidden dangers as you fight to secure humanity's future.
